terms.sldefinition: Vihar, ki ga povzroči močno dviganje zračnih tokov, značilnosti so grmenje, bliskanje in ponavadi močan dež ali toča.
terms.crotranslation: Oluja koja nastaje snažnim zračnim strujama koje se dižu i čija su obilježja grmljavina i munje, a obično i jaka kiša ili tuča.

terms.definition: A coating of ice, generally clear and smooth but usually containing some air pockets, formed on exposed objects by the freezing of a film of supercooled water deposited by rain, drizzle, or fog, or possibly condensed from supercooled water vapour.
terms.sldefinition: Ledena plast, navadno prozorna in gladka, ki ponavadi vsebuje nekaj zračnih mehurčkov, nastane na izpostavljenih objektih, ko zamrzne fina, tanka plast vode, ki je rezultata dežja, rošenja, megle ali kondenza podhlajenih vodnih kapljic.
terms.crotranslation: Sloj leda, općenito proziran i gladak, ali obično sadrži neke zračne džepove, koji se stvaraju na izloženim predmetima smrzavanjem sloja jako ohlađene vode koju nanosi kiša, rosulja ili magla, ili eventualno kondenzirana iz vrlo ohlađene vodene pare.

terms.definition: The process of extracting underground water from a source.
terms.sldefinition: Proces pridobivanja podtalnice iz določenega izvira.
terms.crotranslation: Proces vađenja podzemne vode iz izvora.

terms.definition: The movement of surface water into soil or rock through cracks and pores.
terms.sldefinition: Premikanje površinske vode v prst ali kamnine preko razpok in por.
terms.crotranslation: Gibanje površinske vode u tlo ili stijene kroz pukotine i pore.

terms.definition: Water that occupies pores, cavities, cracks and other spaces in the crustal rocks. It includes water precipitated from the atmosphere which has percolated through the soil, water that has risen from deep magmatic sources liberated during igneous activity and fossil water retained in sedimentary rocks since their formation. The presence of groundwater is necessary for virtually all weathering processes to operate. Phreatic water is synonymous with groundwater and is the most important source of any water supply.
terms.sldefinition: Voda, ki zaseda pore, votline, razpoke in druge prostore v kamninah skorje. To so padavine iz ozračja, ki pronicajo skozi prst, voda, ki se vzdigne iz globokih magmatskih virov, ti se sprostijo med vulkanskim delovanjem, ter fosilna voda, ki je bila v sedimentnih kamninah ohranjena od njihovega nastanka. Prisotnost podtalnice je potrebna za tako rekoč vse postopke preperevanja. Sinonim za najpomembnejši vir vodne zaloge je talna voda, tudi talnica.
terms.translation: gornja granica podzemne vode; nivo podzemne vode
terms.crotranslation: Voda koja zauzima pore, šupljine, pukotine i druge prostore u kamenju Zemljine kore. Uključuje oborinsku vodu iz atmosfere koja se procijedila kroz tlo, vodu koja se digla iz dubokih magmatskih izvora oslobođena tijekom magmatske aktivnosti i fosilnu vodu zadržanu u sedimentnim stijenama od njihova formiranja. Prisutnost podzemnih voda nužna je za doslovno sve vremenske procese. Freatska voda (voda temeljnica) je sinonim za podzemne vode i najvažniji je izvor svake vodoopskrbe.

terms.definition: Precautionary actions, procedures or installations undertaken to prevent or reduce harm to the environmental integrity of drainage areas used to catch water, such as reservoirs or basins.
terms.sldefinition: Preventivna dejanja, postopki ali ukrepi, začeti za preprečitev ali zmanjšanje škode okoljskega ravnovesja drenažnih področij, ki se uporabljajo za ujetje vode, kot so vodni zadrževalniki ali zbiralniki.
terms.crotranslation: Mjere predostrožnosti, postupci ili uređaji za sprječavanje ili smanjenje štete za cjelovitost okoliša u područjima odvodnje koje se upotrebljavaju za crpljenje vode, kao spremnici ili bazeni.

terms.definition: Water table is inherently susceptible to contamination from landuse activities. Remediation is very expensive and often impractical. Prevention of contamination is therefore critical in effective groundwater management.
terms.sldefinition: Podtalnica je sama po sebi zelo dovzetna za onesnaževanja zaradi različnih dejavnosti. Odprava škode je zelo draga in pogosto nepraktična. Zaščita pred onesnaženjem je odločilna za učinkovito upravljanje s podtalnico.
terms.crotranslation: Nivo podzemne vode je sam po sebi osjetljiv na onečišćenje od djelatnosti korištenja zemljišta. Sanacija je vrlo skupa i često nepraktična. Zbog toga je prevencija onečišćenja ključna u učinkovitom gospodarenju podzemnim vodama.

terms.definition: The total quantity of water flowing from the catchment during the period of the flood.
terms.sldefinition: Vsa količina vode, ki teče iz vodnega zadrževalnika v času poplave.
terms.crotranslation: Ukupna količina vode koje teče iz poriječja u razdoblju poplave.

terms.definition: The filling or partial filling with silt of a reservoir that receives fine-grained sediment brought in by streams and surface runoff.
terms.sldefinition: Zapolnjevanje ali delno zapolnjevanje z muljem iz rezervoarjev, v katerih se zbirajo drobno zmlete usedline iz potokov in površinskih odtokov.
terms.crotranslation: Punjenje ili djelomično punjenje muljem nekog spremnika koji prima sitnozrnati sediment što ga donose potoci i površinsko otjecanje.

terms.definition: The science and technology of measuring specific gravities, particularly of liquids.
terms.sldefinition: Znanost in tehnologija, ki se ukvarja z merjenjem specifične teže, predvsem tekočin.
terms.crotranslation: Znanost i tehnologija koja se bavi mjerenjem specifične težine, osobito tekućina.

terms.definition: The hydrological processes generating river floods have been studied extensively and several modelling concepts have been proposed. The standard procedure for flood forecasting consists of calibrating the parameters of the model of a particular river basin on a representative set of historical hydrometric data and subsequently applying this calibrated model in a real-time environment.
terms.sldefinition: Hidrološke procese, ki povzročajo nastanek poplav, se je v preteklosti zelo preučevalo, predlaganih je bilo kar nekaj konceptov modelov. Standardni postopek napovedovanja poplav je sestavljen iz umerjanja parametrov modela določenega porečja na podlagi reprezentativnih vzorcev zgodovinskih hidrometričnih podatkov in uporabo tega modela v trenutnem, realnem okolju.
terms.crotranslation: Hidrološki procesi kojima nastaju poplave rijeka opsežno su proučavani i predloženo je nekoliko koncepata modeliranja. Standardni postupak za predviđanje poplava sastoji se od kalibracije parametara modela određenoga riječnog sliva na reprezentativnoj skupini povijesnih hidrometrijskih podataka i nakon toga je ovaj kalibrirani model primijenjen u okruženju realnog vremena.

terms.definition: The configuration or arrangement in plan view of the natural stream courses in an area. It is related to local geologic and geomorphologic features and history. Synonym: drainage pattern.
terms.sldefinition: Razmestitev naravnih vodotokov na določenem območju. Odvisna je od lokalnih geoloških in geomorfoloških pojavov in od njihovega razvoja. Sinonim: drenažni vzorec.
terms.crotranslation: Konfiguracija ili tlocrtni raspored prirodnih vodotoka u nekom području. Odnosi se na lokalne geološke i geomorfološke značajke i povijest. Sinonim: način odvodnje.

terms.definition: The scientific study of sedimentary rocks and of the processes by which they were formed; the description, classification, origin, and interpretation of sediments.
terms.sldefinition: Znanstveno preučevanje sedimentnih kamnin in postopkov njihovega nastanka - popis, razvrstitev, izvor in razlaga usedlin.
terms.crotranslation: Znanstveno proučavanje sedimentnih stijena i procesa kojima su one nastale; opis, klasifikacija, podrijetlo i tumačenje sedimenata.

terms.definition: 1) The drainage basin of a stream. 2) An area occupied by a lake and its drainage basin.
terms.sldefinition: 1) Porečje nekega vodotoka. 2) Območje, ki ga zavzema jezero in njegovo pojezerje.
terms.crotranslation: 1) Poriječje nekog vodotoka. 2) Područje na kojem se nalazi neko jezero i njegov sliv.

terms.definition: Freshwater in which bathing is explicitly authorised or in which bathing is not prohibited and is traditionally practised by a large number of bathers. Water in such areas must meet specified quality standards relating to chemical, microbiological and physical parameters.
terms.sldefinition: Sladke vode, v katerih je izrecno dovoljeno kopanje, ali pa ni prepovedano, in se ga tradicionalno udeležuje veliko število kopalcev. Kakovost vode mora dosegati predpisane standarde za kemijske, mikrobiološke in fizikalne parametre.
terms.crotranslation: Slatka voda u kojoj je kupanje izričito odobreno ili u kojoj nije zabranjeno i gdje se tradicionalno kupa velik broj kupača. Voda u takvim područjima mora ispunjavati određene standarde kvalitete koji se odnose na kemijske, mikrobiološke i fizikalne parametre.

terms.definition: A body of water that is owned and maintained by a national governmental body or agency.
terms.sldefinition: Voda, katere lastnik in upravljavec je državno vladno telo ali služba.
terms.crotranslation: Voda čiji je vlasnik i upravitelj državno vladino tijelo ili služba.

terms.definition: A body of water that is owned and maintained by an individual or entity other than the national government.
terms.sldefinition: Vodno telo, ki je v lasti in oskrbi posameznika ali entitete, ne pa nacionalne vlade.
terms.crotranslation: Vodno tijelo koje je u vlasništvu i koje održava pojedinac ili tijelo koje nije državna vlast.

terms.definition: A commonly used term in Scotland and Ireland for a stretch waterlogged, spongy ground, chiefly composed of decaying vegetable matter, especially of rushes, cotton grass, and sphagnum moss.
terms.sldefinition: Splošno uveljavljen izraz na Škotskem in Irskem za mokroten svet z mehkimi tlemi, v glavnem ga sestavljajo ostanki razkrajanja rastlin, predvsem ločje, travinje in šotni mahovi.
terms.crotranslation: Uobičajeni izraz koji se u Škotskoj i Irskoj upotrebljava za preplavljeno, spužvasto tlo, koje se uglavnom sastoji od biljnih tvari koje se raspadaju, osobito trske, šaša i tresetne mahovine.

terms.definition: Any mechanical procedure or process where some or all of the salt is removed from water.
terms.sldefinition: Vsaka mehanski postopek oziroma proces, s katerim je sol delno ali v celoti odstranjena iz vode.
terms.crotranslation: Svaki mehanički postupak ili proces kojim se dio soli ili sva sol uklanja iz vode.

terms.definition: Sea waters in which bathing is explicitly authorised or in which bathing is not prohibited and is traditionally practised by a large number of bathers. Water in such areas must meet specified quality standards relating to chemical, microbiological and physical parameters.
terms.sldefinition: Morska voda, v kateri je izrecno dovoljeno kopanje, ali pa ni prepovedano, in se ga tradicionalno udeležuje veliko število kopalcev. Kakovost vode mora dosegati predpisane standarde za kemijske, mikrobiološke in fizikalne parametre.
terms.crotranslation: Morska voda u kojoj je kupanje izričito odobreno ili u kojoj nije zabranjeno i gdje se tradicionalno kupa velik broj kupača. Voda u takvim područjima mora ispunjavati određene standarde kvalitete koji se odnose na kemijske, mikrobiološke i fizikalne parametre.

terms.definition: The mouth or outlet of a river, drain, sewer or any other place at which drainage or wastewater is discharged into a body of oceanic water.
terms.sldefinition: Rečno ali kanalsko ustje ali izliv ali katerokoli drugo mesto, kjer se drenaža ali odpadna voda izloča v oceansko vodo.
terms.crotranslation: Ušće ili ispust iz rijeke, odvodna cijev, kanalizacijski odvod ili bilo koje drugo mjesto na kojem se nalazi odvod otpadnih voda ili se one ispuštaju u ocean.

terms.definition: The utilization of the ocean for its food resources, mineral resources, and energy and water sources.
terms.sldefinition: Uporaba oceanov zaradi njihovih virov hrane, rudninskih, energijskih ter vodnih virov.
terms.crotranslation: Iskorištavanje prehrambenih resursa, mineralnih sirovina te energije i izvora vode iz oceana.

terms.definition: A regular movement of marine waves created by wind stress in the open ocean which travels considerable distances away from the generating field and into another wind field. The waves are characterized by relatively smooth, generally unbroken, crests and a fairly regular wavelength, but swell increases in wavelength and decreases in wave height as it moves away from the generating area. Local wind waves may be superimposed upon swell waves as they approach a coastline, thereby creating sharper crests and a choppy sea.
terms.sldefinition: Običajno gibanje morskih valov, na odprtem morju nastanejo zaradi vetra, ki prepotuje precejšne razdalje od polja, kjer nastajajo, do naslednjega vetrovnega pola. Značilnost valov so dokaj enakomerni, ponavadi ne zlomljeni grebeni in dokaj simetrične dolžine valov. Valovanje narašča po dolžini in se po višini zmanjšuje z oddaljenostjo od področja nastanka. Valovi lokalnega vetra so lahko dodajo na izbokline valov med približevanjem obali in tako oblikujejo ostrejše grebene in razburkano morje.
terms.crotranslation: Redovno gibanje morskih valova koje stvaraju naleti vjetra na otvorenom koje se prenosi na znatne udaljenosti od polja nastanka i u drugo polje vjetra. Valovi se odlikuju relativno glatkim, uglavnom neprekinutim, visinama i prilično redovitim valnim duljinama, ali duljina vala se povećava, a visina smanjuje dok se on udaljava od mjesta nastanka. Valovi nastali djelovanjem lokalnog vjetra mogu se natkriliti nad visoke valove dok se ovi približavaju obali, pa stvaraju oštrije vrhove (kreste) vala i nemirno more.

terms.definition: Contamination of the generally broad portion of a stream near its outlet which is influenced by the tide of the water body into which it flows. Many estuaries have become badly contaminated by wastes that have been generated from heavily populated areas.
terms.sldefinition: Onesnaženje velikega dela vodotoka ob njegovem izlivu, kjer so prisotni vplivi plimovanja vodnega telesa, v katerega se izliva. Mnoga rečna ustja so postala zelo onesnažena zaradi vnašanja odplak in odpadkov, ki so nastali na gosto poseljenih območjih.
terms.crotranslation: Onečišćenje općenito širokog dijela potoka u blizini njegovog ispusta koji je pod utjecajem plime vodnog tijela u koje se ulijeva. Mnogi estuariji su postali jako onečišćen otpadom nastalim u gusto naseljenim područjima.

terms.definition: The administration or handling of a waterway or a stream of flowing water.
terms.sldefinition: Upravljanje oziroma vodenje reke ali toka tekoče vode.
terms.crotranslation: Upravljanje ili gospodarenje vodotokom ili tokom tekuće vode.

terms.definition: Removing lodged deposits of rock fragments and other debris by water flow at high velocity; used to clean water conduits and drilled boreholes.
terms.sldefinition: Odstranjevanje naloženih plasti kamninskega drobirja in drugega zdrobljenega materiala s hitrotekočo vodo; uporablja se za čiščenje vodnih kanalov in vrtin.
terms.crotranslation: Uklanjanje nataloženih naslaga kamenja i drugih krhotina vodom koja teče velikom brzinom; upotrebljava se za čišćenje vodenih kanala i bušotina.

terms.definition: A chamber with gates on both ends connecting two sections of a canal or other waterway, to raise or lower the water level in each section.
terms.sldefinition: Komora, kjer je prostor zagrajen z obeh strani in povezuje oba konca prekopa ali katerekoli vodne poti, v katerem se po sekcijah dviga ali spušča nivo vode.
terms.crotranslation: Komora s vratima na obje strane koja povezuje dva dijela kanala ili nekog drugog vodotoka, koja služi za podizanje ili spuštanje razine vode u svakoj sekciji.

terms.definition: Cutting down by scythe or machine at intervals the vegetation growth and grasses on banks and berms of irrigation and drainage channels or cropped areas.
terms.sldefinition: Občasna košnja s koso ali kosilnico rastlinja in trave, rastočih na bregovih, namakalnih nasipih, drenažnih kanalih ali obdelanih področjih.
terms.crotranslation: Košenje s pomoću kose ili stroja u intervalima raslinja i trave koja raste na obalama i improviziranim nasipima kanala za navodnjavanje i odvodnju ili obrađivanim područjima.

terms.definition: Engineering work which aims at the protection of banks of a river, or slopes of embankments along it, from erosion by the current of flow, from floods, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Inženirski ukrepi, s katerimi poskušajo zaščititi bregove rek, pobočja ali nabrežine pred erozijo vodnega toka, poplavami, itd.
terms.crotranslation: Konstrukcijski radovi namijenjeni zaštiti obala rijeka ili padinama nasipa rijeka od erozije vodnog toka, poplava itd.

terms.definition: Basin used to hold water in storage.
terms.sldefinition: Kotlina, ki hrani vodo.
terms.crotranslation: Bazen za pohranu vode.

terms.definition: The drawing of water from a reservoir by means of draining pipes located at the bottom of the basin and controlled by a system of sluices which ensure, if necessary, the emptying of the basin in a given period of time in respect of downstream conditions.
terms.sldefinition: Črpanje vode iz rezervoarja z drenažnimi cevmi, ki se nahajajo pod rezervoarjem in jih kontrolira sistem zapornic, ki se po potrebi odprejo in izpraznijo vodo v drenažnih ceveh v določenem času, glede na vodne razmere nizvodno.
terms.crotranslation: Ispuštanje vode iz spremnika pomoću drenažnih cijevi koje se nalaze na dnu bazena i kontroliraju sustavom zapornica koje prema potrebi osiguravaju pražnjenje bazena u određenom vremenskom razdoblju s obzirom na uvjete nizvodno od spremnika.

terms.definition: Complex series of reactions between the water and metal surfaces and materials in which the water is stored or transported. The corrosion process is an oxidation/reduction reaction that returns refined or processed metal to their more stable ore state. With respect to the corrosion potential of drinking water, the primary concerns include the potential presence of toxic metals , such as lead and copper.
terms.sldefinition: Kompleksni nizi reakcij med vodo in kovinskimi površinami ter materiali, v katerih je voda shranjena oziroma, v katerih se vodo transportira. Proces korozije je reakcija oksidacije-redukcije, ki vrne rafinirano oziroma obdelano kovino v njeno obstojnejše rudninsko stanje. Glede na korozivne zmožnosti pitne vode osnovna skrb vključuje morebitno prisotnost toksičnih kovin, kot sta svinec ter baker.
terms.crotranslation: Složen niz reakcija između vode i metalnih površina i materijala u kojima je voda pohranjena ili se prevozi. Proces korozije je reakcija oksidacije i redukcije koja vraća rafinirani ili prerađeni metal u njegovo stabilnije stanje rudače. S obzirom na korozijski potencijal pitke vode, najveću zabrinutost izaziva mogućnost prisutnosti toksičnih metala, kao što su olovo i bakar.

terms.definition: Progress in, or betterment of, the environmental condition and integrity of water.
terms.sldefinition: Napredek oziroma izboljšava okoljskih pogojev in vodnega ravnovesja.
terms.crotranslation: Napredak, ili poboljšanje, stanja okoliša i ravnoteže vode.

terms.definition: Taste in water can be caused by foreign matter, such as organic compounds, inorganic salts or dissolved gases. These materials may come from domestic, agricultural or natural sources. Some substances found naturally in groundwater, while not necessarily harmful, may impart a disagreeable taste or undesirable property to the water. Magnesium sulphate, sodium sulphate, and sodium chloride are but a few of these. Acceptable waters should be free from any objectionable taste at point of use.
terms.sldefinition: Okus v vodi je lahko posledica tujkov, kot so organske snovi, anorganske soli ali raztopljeni plini, ki v vodo pridejo iz gospodinjskih, kmetijskih ter naravnih virov. Nekatere snovi, ki so prisotne v podtalnici v naravi, niso nujno nevarne, vendar dajo vodi neprijeten okus ali nezaželene značilnosti. Magnezijev sulfat, natrijev sulfat in natrijev klorid so nekatere izmed teh snovi. Ustrezna voda, bi morala biti na točki uporabe brez neprijetnega okusa.
terms.crotranslation: Okus vodi mogu dati strana tijela, kao što su organski spojevi, anorganske soli ili otopljeni plinovi. Ti materijali mogu biti iz domaćih, poljoprivrednih ili prirodnih izvora. Neke tvari koje se u prirodnom obliku nalaze u podzemnim vodama, a koje nisu nužno štetne, mogu vodi davati neugodan okus ili neko nepoželjno svojstvo. Magnezijev sulfat, natrijev sulfat i natrijev klorid samo su neke od tih tvari. U trenutku korištenja prihvatljiva voda ne smije imati nikakav nepoželjan okus.

terms.definition: A proliferation of a marine green plankton toxic and often fatal to fish, perhaps stimulated by the addition of nutrients.
terms.sldefinition: Razraščanje morskega zelenega planktona, ki je strupen in pogosto usoden za ribe, rast verjetno spodbuja vnos hranil.
terms.crotranslation: Rast zelenog morskog planktona koji je toksičan i često poguban za ribe, možda potaknut dodatavanjem hranjivih tvari.

terms.definition: Matter suspended in a fluid by the upward components of turbulent currents or by colloidal suspension.
terms.sldefinition: Trdni delci, lebdeči v fluidu (tekočini ali plinu) zaradi dvižne komponente vrtinčastih tokov ali koloidne suspenzije.
terms.crotranslation: Materijal suspendiran u tekućini komponentama turbulentnih struja koje se gibaju prema gore ili koloidnim suspenzijama.

terms.definition: The degree of dissolved salts in water measured by weight in parts per thousand.
terms.sldefinition: Stopnja raztopljenih soli v vodi se meri s težo v promilih.
terms.crotranslation: Stupnj rastopljenih soli u vodi mjeri se u promilima težine.

terms.definition: A structure in which water is collected.
terms.sldefinition: Konstrukcija, v kateri se zbira voda.
terms.crotranslation: Konstrukcija u kojoj se skuplja voda.

terms.definition: A stream of water that is forced up into the air through a small hole, especially for decorative effect or the structure in a lake or pool from which this flows.
terms.sldefinition: Vodni tok, ki se je prisiljen dvigniti proti površju skozi majhno luknjo, še zlasti za okras ali kot zgradba na jezeru ali bazenu, iz katerega teče.
terms.crotranslation: Mlaz vode koja se tjera prema gore u zrak kroz mali otvor, osobito kao ukras ili konstrukcija u jezeru ili bazenu iz kojeg istječe.

terms.definition: Artificial or natural area of water, used for storing water for domestic or industrial use.
terms.sldefinition: Umetno ali naravno vodno območje, ki se uporablja za shranjevanje vode za gospodinjsko ali industrijsko rabo.
terms.crotranslation: Umjetno ili prirodno vodeno područje koje se upotrebljava za pohranjivanje vode za upotrebu u kućanstvima ili industriji.

terms.definition: The removal of minerals from water by chemical, ion-exchange, or distillation procedures.
terms.sldefinition: Odstranjevanje mineralov iz vode s kemikaliji, izmenjavo ionov ter destilacijo.
terms.crotranslation: Uklanjanje minerala iz vode s pomoću kemikalija, ionskom izmjenom ili postupcima destilacije.

terms.definition: A process in which used or spent water is treated at the point of origin or where it was produced, by using a septic tank or some other system to remove or reduce the impact of constituent wastes on human health and the environment.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek obdelave uporabljene in odpadne vode ob izviru ali tam, kjer jo obdelujejo, z uporabo greznice ali kakega drugega sistema za odstranjevanje ali zmanjševanje vpliva odpadnih sestavin na človeško zdravje in okolje.
terms.crotranslation: Proces u kojem se upotrijebljena ili potrošena voda obrađuje na mjestu nastanka ili gdje je proizvedena, pomoću septičke jame ili nekoga drugog sustava za uklanjanje ili smanjenje učinka sastavnica otpada na ljudsko zdravlje i okoliš.

terms.sldefinition: NULL
terms.crotranslation: NULL

terms.definition: Basin used to hold water which falls as rain during a storm.
terms.sldefinition:
Rezervoar za hranjenje vode, ki pade v obliki dežja med nevihto.
*** seveda to ni le dež med nevihto, ampak vse oblike padavin
terms.translation: spremnik za oborinsku vodu; retencijski bazen; akumulacija oborinske vode
terms.crotranslation: Spremnik za čuvanje vode koja padne u obliku kiše za vrijeme oluje.

terms.definition: Channels for clearing away rain water.
terms.sldefinition: Kanali za odstranjevanje dežnih padavin.
terms.crotranslation: Kanali za uklanjanje kišnice.

terms.definition: Sewer system having distinct pipes for collecting superficial water and sewage water.
terms.sldefinition: Kanalizacijski sistem s posebnimi cevmi za zbiranje površinskih voda in odplak.
terms.crotranslation: Kanalizacijski sustav s posebnim cijevima za skupljanje površinskih voda i kanalizacijske otpadne vode.

terms.definition: A sewer intended to serve as a sanitary sewer and a storm sewer, or as an industrial sewer and a storm sewer.
terms.sldefinition: Kanalizacija, ki je namenjena odvajanju tako komunalnih odplak, kot meteornih vod, ali odvajanju tako industrijskih odplak, kot meteornih vod.
terms.crotranslation: Kanalizacija koja služi kao sanitarna odvodnja i kanalizacija za oborinske vode, ili kao industrijska kanalizacija i kanalizacija za oborinske vode.

terms.definition: Addition of air to sewage or water so as to raise its dissolved oxygen level.
terms.sldefinition: Dodajanja zraka v odplake oziroma vodo, tako da naraste stopnja raztopljenega kisika.
terms.crotranslation: Dodavanja zraka kanalizaciji ili vodi kako bi se povećala njihova razina otopljenog kisika.

terms.definition: The process of using a natural system or mechanical device to collect, treat and discharge or reclaim wastewater from an individual dwelling without the use of community-wide sewers or a centralised treatment facility.
terms.slterm: notranji sistem zbiranja, obdelave in ponovne rabe odpade vode
terms.sldefinition: Proces uporabe naravnega sistema ali mehanske naprave, ki zbira, predeluje in izloča ali ponovno vrne v uporabo odpadno vodo posameznega stanovanja brez uporabe javnih kanalizacijskih sistemov ali centralne čistilne naprave (princip zaprtega krogotoka).
terms.translation: unutarnji sustav prikupljanja; pročišćavanja i ponovne upotrebe otpadne vode
terms.crotranslation: Postupak u kojem se upotrebljava prirodni sustav ili mehanički uređaj za prikupljanje, obradu i ispuštanje te oporabu otpadnih voda iz pojedinačne stambene jedinice bez upotrebe komunalnog kanalizacijskog sustava ili središnjeg objekta za pročiščavanje.

terms.definition: A basin in which suspended matter is removed either by quiescent settlement or by continuous flow at high velocity and extended retention time to allow deposition.
terms.sldefinition: Kotanja, od koder je odložena snov odstranjena v obliki mirnih usedlin ali z neprestanim tokom pri visoki hitrosti in raztegnjenim časom zadrževanja, ki je potreben, da pride do odlaganja.
terms.crotranslation: Bazen u kojem se suspendirane tvari uklanjaju ili mirnim taloženjem ili kontinuiranim protokom uz velike brzine, te produženo vrijeme zadržavanja da se omogući taloženje.

terms.definition: A system of secondary sewage treatment which is similar to self-purification action of streams; it is more accurately a biological oxidizing bed; the effluent is placed on the stones in the bed and microorganisms present consume the solids as a food supply.
terms.sldefinition: Sistem sekundarne obdelave odplak je podoben samoočiščevalnim dejanjem potokov. Bolj natančno je to biološko oksidacijsko dno. Odpadna voda je nameščena na kamnito dno, ta prisotni mikroorganizmi trdne delce zaužijejo kot hrano.

terms.definition: Wastewater or utilized water from a home, community, farm or industry, which is often discharged after utilization.
terms.sldefinition: Odpadna oziroma porabljena voda iz domov, družbe, kmetij in industrije, ki je po uporabi izlita.

terms.definition: The liquid wastes deriving from domestic, commercial and industrial activities of an urban settlement.
terms.sldefinition: Tekoči odpadki, ki so posledica gospodinjskih, trgovskih in industrijskih dejavnosti urbanih naselbin.

terms.definition: Partially or completely treated water or waste water flowing out of a waste treatment plant.
terms.sldefinition: Delno ali popolnoma obdelana voda oziroma odpadna voda, ki teče iz naprave za obdelavo odpadkov.

terms.definition: Types of wastewater treatment in which biochemical or bacterial action is intensified to oxidize and stabilize the unstable organic matter present. Examples of this type of treatment use intermittent sand filters, trickling filters, and activated sludge processes and sludge digestion.
terms.sldefinition: Tip ravnanja z odpadnimi vodami, kjer se pospeši biokemično in bakterijsko delovanje z namenom, da se oksidira in stabilizira prisotne nestabilne organske snovi. Primeri takega ravnanja uporabljajo vmesne peščene filtre, filtre, ki uporabljajo curljanje ter procesiranje in predelavo z aktivnim blatom.

terms.definition: The process in which sunlight, bacterial action and oxygen cause self-purification in waste water, Usually taking place in a shallow pond, or system of such ponds.
terms.sldefinition: Proces, kjer sončna svetloba, delovanje bakterij in kisik omogočajo samoočiščevanje odpadne vode. Ponavadi se tak proces odvija v majhnem, plitvem umetnem jezeru ali sistemu takih jezer.

terms.definition: A process in which naturally occurring microorganisms, plants, trees or geophysical processes break down, degrade or filter out hazardous substances or pollutants from a body of water, cleansing and treating contaminated water without human intervention.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek, kjer v mikroorganizmi, rastline, drevesa iz narave ali geofizični procesi, razcepijo, razkrojijo ali filtrirajo nevarne snovi oziroma onesnaževala iz vodnega telesa, gre za čiščenje in obdelavo onesnažene vode brez človeških posegov.

terms.definition: Measures and activities concerning the supply of water, the improvement of efficiency in its use, the reduction of losses and waste, water-saving practices to reduce costs and to slow the depletion of the water supply to ensure future water availability.
terms.sldefinition: Ukrepi in dejavnosti, ki zadevajo oskrbo z vodo, izboljšanje učinkovitosti in njene uporabe, zmanjšanje izgub in odpadkov, načini varčevanja z vodo za zmanjševanje stroškov in za upočasnjeno izčrpavanje vodnih virov za zagotavljanje dostopnosti vode za prihodnost.

terms.definition: Centralized recycling centres to which waste materials are brought and where they are separated.
terms.sldefinition: Osrednje reciklažno središče, kamor so pripeljani odpadki, ki se jih tam ločuje.

terms.definition: Area where waste material, especially metal, is dumped.
terms.sldefinition: Mesto odlaganja odpadnih snovi, zlasti kovine.

terms.definition: Industry for the transformation of solid waste into useful products.
terms.sldefinition: Industrija, ki trdne odpadke pretvarja v uporabne izdelke.

terms.english: use of waste as energy source
terms.sldefinition: NULL
NULL

terms.definition: The process of removing dirt, litter or other unsightly materials from shore line property or surrounding areas.
terms.sldefinition: Proces odstranjevanja nesnage, odpadkov ali drugih nevšečnih materialov z obale ali njene okolice.

terms.definition: Large items of waste material, such as appliances, furniture, large auto parts, trees, branches, stumps, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Veliki kosi odpadnega materiala, npr. gospodinjski aparati, pohištvo, avtodeli, drevesa, veje, štori, itd.

terms.definition: A primary cell that uses an alkaline electrolyte, usually potassium hydroxide, and delivers about 1.5 volts at much higher current rates than the common carbon-zinc cell. Also known as alkaline-manganese cell.
terms.sldefinition: Primarna celica, ki uporablja alkalni elektrolit, ponavadi kalijev hidroksid, in ustvari približno 1.5 voltov pri veliko večjem toku, kot navadna ogljiko-cinkova celica. Znana je tudi kot alkalna manganova celica.

terms.definition: A direct-current voltage source made up of one or more units that convert chemical, thermal, nuclear, or solar energy into electrical energy.
terms.sldefinition: Vir enosmerne napetosti, ki je sestavljen iz ene ali več enot, ki pretvarjajo kemično, toplotno, jedrsko ali sončno energijo v električno energijo.

terms.definition: Wastes resulting from the operations of pollutant removal from industries, cleaning processes, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Odpadki, ki so poledica odstranjevanja onesnaževal iz industrije, posledica čistilnih postopkov itd.
NULL

terms.definition: Discarded material produced in any industrial process for which there is no specified mode of disposal.
terms.sldefinition: Zavržene snovi, ki nastajajo v industrijskih postopkih in zanje ni določene oblike odlaganja.

terms.definition: Metal material discarded during manufacturing or processing operations which cannot be directly fed back into the operation; Worn or discarded metal materials removed from service at the end of its useful life.
terms.sldefinition: Kovinski proizvodi, ki so med izdelovanjem ali predelavo zavrženi in jih ni mogoče takoj ponovno uporabiti. Obrabljeni ali zavrženi kovinski proizvodi, ki so po preteku roka uporabnosti odstranjeni.

terms.definition: Waste material resulting from ore extraction that is usually left on the soil surface.
terms.sldefinition: Odpadni material, ki nastane ob izkopavanju rude in ponavadi ostane na zemeljski površini.

terms.definition: The hulk of a wrecked or stranded ship; a ship dashed against rocks or land and broken or otherwise rendered useless.
terms.sldefinition: Trup razbite ali nasedle ladje; ladja, raztreščena ob skale ali kopno, polomljena ali drugače neuporabna.

terms.definition: Oil which derives from petroleum and is made up of hydrocarbons.
terms.sldefinition: Olja, pridobljena iz nafte in sestavljena iz ogljikovodikov.

terms.definition: The watery liquid that separates from the curd when the milk is clotted, as in making cheese.
terms.sldefinition: Vodena tekočina, ki se od skute loči, ko se mleko sesiri, na primer pri izdelavi sira.

terms.definition: A manner of waste disposal in which refuse or unwanted material is dumped or submerged beneath the surface of a body of water.
terms.sldefinition: Način odlaganja odpadkov, tako da so porabljene in nezaželene snovi odvržene ali potopljene pod površino vodnega telesa.

terms.definition: Dust or other residue left after reducing a material to very small particles.
terms.sldefinition: Prah ali drugi ostanki, ki ostanejo po pretvarjanju materiala v zelo majhne delce.

terms.definition: Material left over from the treatment of any type of waste.
terms.sldefinition: Snovi, ki ostanejo po kakršnikoli obdelavi odpadkov.

terms.definition: Any material, solid or semisolid, left after processing in a device designed to reduce waste volume by combustion.
terms.sldefinition: Katerakoli trdna ali poltrdna snov, ki ostane po predelavi v napravi, ki je namenjena zmanjševanju količine odpadkov s pomočjo gorenja.
NULL

terms.definition: Sludge whose water content has been reduced by physical means.
terms.sldefinition: Blato, ki mu je s fizikalnimi sredstvi zmanjšana vsebnost vode.

terms.definition: The excess, unusable semi-solids or sediment resulting from a wastewater treatment or industrial process.
terms.sldefinition: Presežek, neuporabne poltrde snovi ali usedlin, ki nastanejo po obdelavi odpadne vode ali po industrijskih postopkih.

terms.definition: Any process beyond gravity sedimentation that increases the concentration of solids in sludge with or without the use of chemical flocculants.
terms.sldefinition: Vsak postopek razen težnostnega posedanja, ki z uporabo ali brez uporabe kemičnih flokulantov poveča koncentracijo trdnih snovi v blatu.

terms.definition: Usually anaerobic sludge digestion, a treatment that stabilizes raw sludge. Fully digested sludge has little readily biodegradable organic matter. It is not smelly and about 50% of the solids are inorganic. Sludge can also be digested aerobically.
terms.sldefinition: Ponavadi anaerobna razgradnja blata je obdelava, ki stabilizira neobdelano blato. Popolnoma razgrajeno blato ima malo lahko biorazgradljivih organskih snovi. Blato ne smrdi in približno 50% trdnih snovi je anorganskih. Razgradnja blata je lahko tudi aerobna.

terms.definition: Operations, functions and processes involved in industrial production.
terms.sldefinition: Postopki, opravila in procesi, ki potekajo v industrijski proizvodnji.

terms.definition: Area of land which is no longer usable for cultivation or for any other purpose after having been the site of an industrial plant.
terms.sldefinition: Ozemlje, ki ni več primerno za obdelavo ali za drugo rabo potem, ko je bil na njem postavljen industrijski obrat.

terms.definition: Facility that is forbidden to be disclosed outside a specified ring of secrecy for reasons of national security.
terms.sldefinition: Objekt, o katerem je prepovedano razpravljati izven določenega tajnega kroga zaradi razlogov državne varnosti.

terms.definition: The act of dismembering the carcass of an animal with the production of organic waste which if improperly disposed cause problems of pollution and fawl smells.
terms.sldefinition: Razkosavanje živalskega trupla, ob katerem nastanejo organski odpadki, nepravilno odloženi lahko povzročijo onesnaženje in smrad.

terms.definition: A place where pigs are kept and reared.
terms.sldefinition: Kraj za rejo prašičev.

terms.definition: The petroleum industry is a complex industry utilizing complex combination of interdependent operations engaged in the storage and transportation, separation of crude molecular constituents, molecular cracking, molecular rebuilding and solvent finishing to produce petrochemical products. Treatment may involve oil separation, precipitation, adsorption, and biological treatment. The refining operations can be divided into four major steps: separation, conversion, treating, and blending. The crude oil is first separated into selected fractions (gasoline, kerosine, fuel oil, etc.). Some of the less valuable products such as heavy naphtha, are converted to products with a greater sale value such as gasoline. The final step is the blending of the refined base stocks with each other and various additive to meet final product specifications. The major pollutants emitted are sulphur oxides, nitrogen oxides, hydrocarbons, carbon monoxide, and malodorous materials.
terms.sldefinition: Naftna industrija je obsežna, za izdelavo petrokemičnih izdelkov uporablja kompleksne kombinacije neodvisnih postopkov, kot so hramba, prevoz, ločevanje neobdelanih molekularnih sestavin, molekularni razcep, sestavljanje molekul in končno topilo. Postopek lahko vključuje ločevanje nafte, precipitacijo, absorpcijo in biološko obdelavo. Postopki rafiniranja so lahko razdeljeni na štiri glavne korake: ločevanje, pretvorba, obdelava in mešanje. Surova nafta je najprej ločena v izbrane frakcije (bencin, kerozin, kurilno olje itd.) Nekateri izmed manj vrednih produktov kot težka destilirana nafta so pretvorjeni v izdelke z večjo vrednostjo, kot je bencin. Končni korak je mešanje prečiščenih osnov in različnih aditivov, da se doseže podrobnosti končnega izdelka. Glavna onesnaževala, ki izpuhtevajo so žveplov oksid, dušikov oksid, ogljikovodik, ogljikov monoksid in smrdljive snovi.

terms.definition: A container or a reservoir for the storage of hydrocarbons.
terms.sldefinition: Zbiralnik ali rezervoar za shranjevanje ogljikovodikov.

terms.definition: Boring a hole for extracting oil.
terms.sldefinition: Vrtanje luknje za črpanje nafte.

terms.definition: Extraction of crushed rock or gravel screened to sizes for use in road surfaces, concretes, or bituminous mixes.
terms.sldefinition: Separacija zdrobljene kamnine ali gramoza glede na velikost delcev za uporabo v cestiščih, betonih ali asfaltnih mešanicah.

terms.definition: A sector of the economy in which an aggregate of enterprises is engaged in the design, manufacture and marketing of mechanical apparatuses for commercial or industrial usage.
terms.sldefinition: Gospodarski sektor, kjer se združba komercialnih podjetij ukvarja z oblikovanjem, izdelavo in trgovanjem s strojnimi napravami za trgovsko in industrijsko rabo.

terms.definition: All interrelated steps of the lumber manufacturing process including tree felling, the removal of tops, branches and bark, the piling and sawing of logs, and the transportation and loading of finished boards or other products.
terms.sldefinition: Vsi med seboj povezani koraki proizvodnih postopkov gradbenega lesa, kar vključuje sekanje dreves, odstranjevanje vrhov, vej in lubja, lupljenje in žaganje hlodov, prevoz in razkladanje končanih desk ter drugih proizvodov.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: The distribution of settled sewage on a bed of inert granular material through which it is allowed to percolate. In doing so, the effluent is aerated thus allowing aerobic bacteria and fungi to reduce its biochemical oxygen demand.
terms.sldefinition: Razporeditev nakopičenih delcev v kanalizaciji, ki se usedejo na dno, ki je nasuto z neaktivnim prodnim nanosom, skozi katerega lahko pronicajo ti delci. Tako je odpadni vodi doveden zrak, ki omogoča rast aerobnih bakterij in gliv, zmanjša pa se biokemična potreba po kisiku.

terms.definition: Removal of chlorine from a substance.
terms.sldefinition: Odstranitev klora iz neke snovi.

terms.definition: The science by which the properties of matter and the sources of power in nature are made useful to humans in structures, machines, and products.
terms.sldefinition: Veda, ki se ukvarja z uporabo energetskih in materialnih virov za potrebe človeštva, ki so uporabni pri gradnji konstrukcij, delovanju strojev in izdelkih.

terms.definition: The process of deriving methane from any source, including livestock manure, landfills, coal mines, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek pridobivanja metana iz kateregakoli vira, vključno z živalskim gnojem, odlagališči odpadkov, premogovniki itd.

terms.definition: The introduction of air into sewage so as to provide aerobic biochemical stabilization during a detention period.
terms.sldefinition: Dodajanje zraka odplakam, da se v določenem času vzpostavi aerobno biokemično ravnovesje.

terms.definition: Breakdown of organic material without the presence of oxygen, a treatment which permanently removes the unpleasant odour of many organic wastes so that they can be used on agricultural land.
terms.sldefinition: Razpadanje organizmov brez prisotnosti kisika; čiščenje, ki trajno odstrani neprijeten vonj mnogih organskih odpadkov na tak način, da so lahko uporabljeni na kmetijskih zemljiščih.

terms.definition: Process that uses microorganisms to decompose organic wastes either into water, carbon dioxide, and simple inorganic substances, or into simpler organic substances, such as aldehydes and acids. The purpose of a biological treatment system is to control the environment for microorganisms so that their growth and activity are enhanced, and provide a means for maintaining high concentration of the microorganisms in contact with the wastes.
terms.sldefinition: Proces, kjer se uporablja mikroorganizme za razkrajanje organskih odpadkov bodisi v vodo, ogljikov dioksid ali preproste anorganske in organske snovi, kot npr. aldehidi in kisline. Namen sistema biološke obdelave je nadzorovanje okolja mikroorganizmov v takih pogojih, da se pospeši njihova rast, delovanje in zadosti visoka koncentracija, da ostajajo v stalnem stiku z odpadki.

terms.definition: Any processing of wastewater, toxic substances or other materials involving a combination of physical and chemical methods, such as physical processes including air-stripping or filtration and chemical processes including coagulation, chlorination or ozonation.
terms.sldefinition: Vsako obdelovanje odpadne vode, strupenih snovi in drugih materialov, to vključuje kombinacijo fizikalnih in kemičnih metod, kot so fizikalni postopki - odvzemanje zraka, ali filtracija, in kemijskih metod - koagulacija, kloriranja in ozoniranje.

terms.definition: Processes that separate components of a waste stream or change the physical form of the waste without altering the chemical structure of the constituent materials. Physical treatment techniques are often used to separate the materials within the waste stream so that they can be reused or detoxified by chemical or biological treatment or destroyed by high-temperature incineration.
terms.sldefinition: Postopki, ki ločijo sestavine odpadkov ali spremenijo fizično obliko odpadkov, ne da bi spremenili kemično strukturo sestavnih materialov. Postopki fizikalne obdelave se pogosto uporabljajo za ločevanje materialov med odpadki, tako da se jih lahko ponovno uporabi, s kemično in biološko obdelavo razstrupi ali uniči s sežiganjem pri viski temperaturi.

terms.definition: Removal of floating solids and suspended solids, both fine and coarse, from raw sewage.
terms.sldefinition: Odstranitev plavajočih in lebdečih trdnih, drobnih ter grobih delcev iz kanalizacijskih odplak.

terms.definition: Stage of the process of waste water treatment: following primary treatment by sedimentation, the second step in most wastewater systems in which biological organisms decompose most of the organic matter into a innocuous, stable form.
terms.sldefinition: Stopnja postopka obdelave odpadne vode: sledi primarni obdelavi z usedanjem, je drugi korak v večini sistemov za odpadno vodo, kjer biološki organizmi organske snovi razkrajajo v neškodljive, nespremenljive oblike.

terms.definition: The process which remove pollutants not adequately removed by secondary treatment, particularly nitrogen and phosphorus; accomplished by means of sand filters, microstraining, or other methods (referring to wastewater treatment).
terms.sldefinition: Postopek za odstranjevanje onesnaževal, ki jih sekundarno čiščenje ne odstrani zadovoljivo, zlasti dušika in fosforja. Čiščenje poteka s pomočjo peščenih filtrov, mikropronicanjem in drugimi metodami, ki so uporabne v obdelavi odpadne vode.

terms.definition: Formation of a glassy or noncrystalline material.
terms.sldefinition: Oblikovanje steklene oziroma nekristalne snovi.

terms.definition: Quarry located below the surface of the earth.
terms.sldefinition: Kamnolom pod zemeljsko površino.

terms.definition: The application of scientific methods and engineering principles to civil engineering problems through acquiring, interpreting, and using knowledge of materials of the crust of the earth.
terms.sldefinition: Uporaba znanstvenih metod in inženirskih vodil v problemih gradbeništva, s pridobivanjem, interpretacijo in uporabo znanja o Zemljinem površju.

terms.definition: The theoretical and applied science of the physical behavior of rocks, representing a "branch of mechanics concerned with the response of rock to the force fields of its physical environment".
terms.sldefinition: Teoretična in uporabna veda o fizikalnem obnašanju kamnin, predstavlja "vejo mehanike, ki se ukvarja z odgovorom kamine na energijska polja fizičnega okolja."

terms.definition: The removal of brush using mechanical means, either by cutting manually or by using machinery for crushing, rolling, flailing, or chipping it, or by chemical means or a combination of these.
terms.sldefinition: Odstranitev grmičevja z mehanskimi in kemičnimi sredstvi ali kombinacijo obeh, bodisi ročno ali z uporabo mehanizacije, s tretjem, obračanjem, mlatenjem ali trganjem.

terms.definition: Precautionary actions, measures or installations implemented to avert the possibility of an unexpected conflagration of any large wooded area having a thick growth of trees and plants.
terms.sldefinition: Previdnostni ukrepi, meritve ali namestitve za preprečitev morebitnega nepričakovanega požara, ki so izvedeni na vsakem velikem gozdnatem področju z gosto rastjo dreves in rastlin.

terms.definition: Precautionary measures, equipment or structures implemented to guard or defend people, property and lands from an unusual accumulation of water above the ground.
terms.sldefinition: Preventivni ukrepi, oprema ali objekti, namenjeni za zaščito in varovanje ljudi, imetja in zemljišč, pred nenavadnim kopičenjem vode na površju.

terms.definition: Measures adopted to control erosion and degradation phenomena in the mountain regions caused by the loss of forest cover due to acid rain, uncontrolled forest cutting, winter skiing resorts construction, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Izvajanje ukrepov z namenom preprečiti erozijo in degradacijo v gorskih območjih. Erozija in degradacija sta posledici odmiranja gozdov zaradi kislega dežja, nenadzorovane sečnje, gradnje zimskih smučarskih središč, itd.

terms.definition: Soil stability depends on its shear strength, its compressibility and its tendency to absorb water. Stabilization methods include physical compaction and treatment with cement, lime, and bitumen.
terms.sldefinition: Stabilnost tal je odvisna od svoje ?? moči, stisljivosti in nagnjenosti k absorpciji vode. Med načine stabilizacije spadajo fizično stiskanje in obdelava s cementom, apnom in bitumnom.

terms.definition: The branch of geology that deals with volcanism.
terms.sldefinition: Veja geologije, ki se ukvarja z delovanji vulkanov.

terms.definition: Rules for minimizing or containing the risks deriving from earthquakes.
terms.sldefinition: Pravila za zmanjšanje ali obvladovanje tveganj, izhajajočih iz potresov.

terms.definition: Actions and measures undertaken, often at a local level, to ensure that citizens of a community are secure from harm, injury, danger or risk.
terms.sldefinition: Dejanja in ukrepi, ki se izvajajo, velikokrat na lokalni ravni, zato, da se zavaruje člane določene skupnosti pred nevarnostjo, poškodbami, ali tveganjem.

terms.definition: Measures or techniques implemented to reduce the risk of injury, loss and danger to persons, property or the environment in any facility or place involving the manufacturing, producing and processing of goods or merchandise.
terms.slterm: industrijska varnost, varnost industrijskih objektov in naprav
terms.sldefinition: Ukrepi ali metode, ki se sprejmejo z namenom, da se prepreči poškodbe, žrtve in zmanjša nevarnost za ljudi, imetje ali okolje, ki jo predstavlja proizvodnja in predelava dobrin in blaga.
terms.crotranslation: Mjere ili tehnike koje se provode radi smanjenja rizika od ozljeda, gubitaka i opasnosti za osobe, imovinu ili okoliš i bilo koji objekt ili mjesto koje uključuju preradu, proizvodnju i obradu robe ili dobara.

terms.definition: The situation or set of circumstances where the probability of harm to an area or its population increases beyond a normal level.
terms.sldefinition: Situacija ali niz okoliščin, kjer se verjetnost za škodo področju in za prebivalstvo poveča nad normalno stopnjo.

terms.definition: Any site or region in which there is a physical or chemical agent capable of causing harm to property, persons, animals, plants or other natural resources.
terms.sldefinition: Kraj ali območje, kjer obstaja fizikalni ali kemični dejavnik, ki lahko škoduje ljudem, imetju, živalim, rastlinam ali drugim naravnim virom.

terms.definition: An unexpected incident, failure or loss occurring through the application of practical or mechanical sciences to industry or commerce that poses potential harm to persons, property or the environment.
terms.sldefinition: Nepričakovana nesreča, okvara ali škoda, kar predstavlja morebitno nevarnost za ljudi, imetje ali okolje.

terms.definition: A sudden, widespread disaster or calamity causing extensive damage to the environment that threatens the quality of life for people living in the affected area or region, potentially leading to many deaths.
terms.sldefinition: Nenadna, razširjena nesreča ali katastrofa, ki povzroči veliko škode okolju, ogroža kakovost življenja ljudi, ki živijo na prizadetem območju ali regiji, potencialno povzroči mnogo smrtnih žrtev.

terms.definition: Risk or danger to human health or the environment posed by radiation emanating from the atomic nuclei of a given substance, or the possibility of an uncontrolled explosion originating from a fusion or fission reaction of atomic nuclei.
terms.sldefinition: Tveganje ali nevarnost za človeško zdravje ali okolje, ki ga povzroči sevanje atomskega jedra določene snovi ali nenadzorovana eksplozija, ki izhaja iz cepitve ali zlitja atomskega jedra.

terms.definition: Installations whose functioning involves the possibility of major hazards such as chemical plants, nuclear, coal and oil power production plants, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Objekti, katerih delovanje vključuje veliko tveganja. Takšni objekti so kemične tovarne, atomske elektrarne, termo elektrarne itd.

terms.definition: Installations whose functioning involves the possibility of major hazards such as chemical plants, nuclear, coal and oil power production plants, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Naprave, katerih delovanje je povezano z možnostjo povzročitve težke nesreče, npr. kemične tovarne, jedrske, termo elektrarne in elektrarne na nafto, itd.

terms.definition: A danger to humans, animals or the environment posed by the application of advanced biological techniques in the manufacture of industrial products, such as the risk or harm that results from exposure to infectious bacteria, viruses or fungi.
terms.sldefinition: Nevarnost za ljudi, živali in okolje, ki jo predstavlja uporaba naprednih bioloških postopkov v proizvodnji industrijskih izdelkov, npr. izpostavljenost nalezljivim bakterijam, virusom in glivam.

terms.definition: A risk connected to the functioning of nuclear power plants, by the storage or transportation of radioactive materials and involving the release of potentially dangerous levels of radioactive materials into the environment.
terms.sldefinition: Tveganje, povezano z delovanjem jedrskih elektrarn glede shranjevanja, prevoza radioaktivnih snovi, ki vključuje sprostitev potencialno nevarne stopnje radioaktivnih snovi v okolje.

terms.definition: Type of transport regulated by special safety rules.
terms.sldefinition: Vrsta prevoza, ki ga opredeljujejo posebni varnostni predpisi.

terms.definition: Zone that has been stricken by a disaster and where measures must be taken to reduce the severity of the human and material damage caused by it.
terms.sldefinition: Območje, ki ga je prizadela katastrofa in se mora zaradi tega sprejeti določene ukrepe, da se ublaži posledice škode, povzročene ljudem ali imetju.

terms.definition: The process of evaluating the scale and probability of harm caused by any hazard to persons, property or the environment.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek ugotavljanja stopnje in verjetnosti, da bo prišlo do škode, ki bi jo povzročila neka nesreča ljudem na imetju al v okolju.

terms.definition: Data communicated or received concerning the recommended means of averting risk of an accident, disaster or other undesirable and avoidable incident.
terms.sldefinition: Sporočeni ali prejeti podatki, ki zadevajo priporočljiva sredstva za preprečevanje tveganja nesreč in drugih nezaželenih ter izogibnih nesreč.

terms.definition: A scheme or method of acting that takes effect if the probability of harm to an area or its population increases beyond a normal level.
terms.sldefinition: Načrt ali metoda delovanja, ki učinkuje, če se verjetnost za škodo področju in prebivalstvu poveča nad normalno stopnjo.

terms.definition: A commercial product which provides a guarantee against damage to property in return for premiums paid.
terms.sldefinition: Komercialni izdelek, ki zagotavlja garancijo proti škodi na imetju v zameno za plačilo zavarovalne premije.

terms.definition: A commercial agreement which provides protection against the risks, or a particular risk, associated with pollution, toxic waste disposal or related concerns.
terms.sldefinition: Ekonomski sporazum, ki zagotavlja zaščito pred tveganjem, povezanim z onesnaževanjem, odlaganjem strupenih odpadkov ali podobnih zadev.

terms.definition: Water damage can be caused by flooding, severe storms, tidal waves, seismic seawaves, storm surges, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Škoda, ki jo povzroči voda, je lahko posledica poplav, hudih neurij, velikih valov pri plimi, potresnih valov, valov ob neurju, itd.

terms.definition: The evaluation or determination of losses, harm and injuries to persons, property or the environment.
terms.sldefinition: Ocena ali določitev izgub, škode ali poškodb oseb, imovine ali okolja.

terms.definition: An expert or official valuation.
terms.sldefinition: Strokovna ali uradna (o)cenitev.

terms.definition: Equivalent in money or other form for a loss sustained for an injury, for property taken, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Nadomestilo v denarju ali v drugi obliki za utrpelo izgubo zaradi poškodbe, odtujene lastnine, itd.

terms.definition: Institution for the management of public issues.
terms.sldefinition: Ustanova za upravljanje javnih zadev.

terms.definition: Public institution for the management of administrative issues.
terms.sldefinition: Javna ustanova za upravljanje z upravnimi zadevami.

terms.english: public institution of industrial and commercial nature
terms.definition: Public institution for the management of industrial and commercial issues.
terms.sldefinition: Javna ustanova za upravljanje z gospodarskimi zadevami.

terms.definition: The position or practice of a qualified person paid for advice or services.
terms.sldefinition: Delovno mesto ali dejavnost, ki jo opravlja kvalificirana oseba, ki je plačana za dajanje nasvetov in nudi določene storitve.

terms.definition: A grant of right to exclude others from making, using or selling one's invention and includes right to license others to make, use or sell it.
terms.sldefinition: Z zakonom določena izključna pravica za izdelovanje, uporabo in prodajo nekega izuma, ki vključuje pravico podeljevanja licenc za izdelavo, uporabo in prodajo.

terms.definition: An official statement or announcement distributed to members of the media by a public relations firm, government agency or some other organization, often to supplement or replace an oral presentation.
terms.sldefinition: Uradna izjava ali objava za predstavnike medijev, ki jo pogosto kot dopolnilo ustni predstavitvi izda podjetje za stike z javnostjo, vladni urad ali neka druga organizacija.

terms.definition: An address or form of oral communication in which a speaker makes his thoughts and emotions known before an audience, often for a given purpose.
terms.sldefinition: Nagovor ali oblika ustnega sporazumevanja, kjer govorec ponavadi z nekim določenim namenom svoje misli in čustva razodene poslušalstvu.

terms.definition: A document submitted by an applicant in support of an undertaking which identifies the environmental impacts of the proposed undertaking and its alternatives.
terms.sldefinition: Dokument, ki ga prosilec za sprejetje nekega projekta predloži v presojo, in ki vsebuje predvidene vplive na okolje in morebitne alternative.

terms.definition: Any motion picture of a story, drama, episode or event, often considered as an art form or used as a medium for entertainment.
terms.sldefinition: Filmska uprizoritev neke zgodbe, drame, epizode ali dogodka, večinoma obravnavan kot oblika umetnosti ali pa kot sredstvo za zabavo.

terms.definition: Any motion picture or movie in which an actual event, era or life story is presented factually, with little or no fiction.
terms.sldefinition: Film, ki prikazuje resnične dogodke, obdobje ali življenjsko zgodbo, predstavljeno z dejstvi, z malo ali nič izmišljenimi dogodki.

terms.definition: A work systematically describing the flora of a particular region, listed by species and considered as a whole.
terms.sldefinition: Delo, ki sistematično opisuje rastlinstvo (floro) določene regije, popisuje vrste in se obravnava kot celota.

terms.definition: A written account or statement describing in detail observations or the results of an inquiry into an event or situation and presented to any person appointed or elected to a high-level position within some political entity.
terms.sldefinition: Pisno poročilo ali izjava, ki podrobno opisuje opazovanja ali rezultate poizvedovanja o dogodku oziroma situaciji in je predstavljeno vsaki osebi, ki je določena ali izvoljena na visoko mesto v neki politični entiteti.

terms.definition: A written account describing in detail observations or the results of an inquiry into an event or situation and presented to an official, deliberative body with legislative powers.
terms.sldefinition: Pisno poročilo, ki podrobno opisuje opazovanja ali zaključke preiskave o dogodku ali položaju, in je predstavljeno uradnemu pravnemu telesu z zakonodajno močjo.

terms.definition: A document or a portion thereof expressing an official enactment of a legislative body, with emphasis on the document's precise wording or language.
terms.sldefinition: Dokument oziroma del, ki izraža uradno uzakonitev zakonodajnega telesa s poudarkom na preciznih izrazih oziroma jeziku.

terms.definition: A dissertation on a particular subject, in which original research has been done, usually by a candidate for a diploma or degree, or a proposition put forward for consideration, to be discussed and proved or maintained against objections.
terms.sldefinition: Razprava o določenem predmetu, ki vsebuje originalno raziskavo ponavadi kandidata za diplomo oziroma drugo višjo obliko izobrazbe, lahko tudi predlog, ki je predložen v premislek, razpravo in je dokazan oziroma obranjen brez ugovorov.

terms.definition: A compact disc on which a large amount of digitalised read-only data can be stored.
terms.scopenote: compact disc read-only-memory
terms.sldefinition: Zgoščenka (CD, op.p.), na katero lahko shranimo veliko količino digitalnih podatkov, ki so zapisani tako, da jih lahko zgolj beremo (ne moremo pa manipulirati z njimi, op.p.).

terms.definition: Any facility devoted to the collection, maintenance and distribution of materials or data compiled to convey knowledge on some subject, often with trained staff persons available to answer questions.
terms.sldefinition: Center, ki zbira, hrani in deli zbrano gradivo ali podatke. Namen je podajati znanje o določeni tematiki. V takem centru ponavadi dela usposobljeno osebje, ki tudi odgovarja na vprašanja.

terms.definition: Factual data, knowledge or instructions relating to scientific research or the development, testing, evaluation, production, use or maintenance of equipment.
terms.sldefinition: Resnični podatki, znanje ali poučevanje, ki se nanaša na znanstvene raziskave ali razvoj, preskušanje, ocenjevanje, proizvodnjo, uporabo ali vzdrževanje pripomočkov.

terms.definition: A system of interrelated persons and/or devices linked to permit the exchange of data or knowledge.
terms.sldefinition: Sistem med seboj povezanih oseb in/ali naprav, ki omogočajo izmenjavo podatkov ali znanja.

terms.definition: Qualitative or quantitative determination of the components of a material, such as an ore or a drug.
terms.sldefinition: Kvalitativno ali kvantitativno določanje sestave snovi, npr. v rudah ali zdravilu.

terms.definition: A way of proceeding or doing something, especially a systematic or regular one.
terms.sldefinition: Oblika načrtnega, premišljenega dejanja, ravnanja ali mišljenja za dosego kakega cilja.

terms.definition: Sector of the metallurgical industry dealing with the production of cast iron, steel and iron alloys. Emissions from these industries tend to settle quickly from the atmosphere and can lead to rising concentrations in the soil. The main raw material input to the production process is iron ore. Also recycled scrap is used.
terms.sldefinition: Sektor v kovinarski industriji, ki zajema proizvodnjo litega železa, jekla in železovih zlitin. Za emisije iz teh dejavnosti je značilno, da se iz ozračja hitro usedajo in dosegajo visoke koncentracije v tleh. Glavna surovina v proizvodnem procesu je železova ruda. Uporablja se tudi reciklirano staro železo.

terms.definition: The resulting effects and interrelationships of human population concentrations, the built environment, and the biophysical environment.
terms.sldefinition: Posledični učinki in medsebojni odnosi skoncentrirane človeške populacije, gradnje okolja in biofizičnega okolja.

terms.definition: Not domesticated animals living independently of man.
terms.sldefinition: Neudomačene živali, ki živijo neodvisno od ljudi.

terms.definition: Operations for preparing and controlling the implementation of plans for organizing human activities on land.
terms.sldefinition: Priprave na in nadzor nad izvedbo načrtov za organizacijo človekove dejavnosti na zemljišču.

terms.definition: The biotopes located in areas where agriculture is practiced.
terms.sldefinition: Biotopi na poljedeljskih področjih.

terms.definition: Groundwater accounts for over 95% of the earth's useable fresh-water resources; over half the world's population depends on groundwater for drinking-water supplies. This invisible resource is vulnerable to pollution and over-exploitation. Effective conservation of groundwater supplies requires the integration of land-use and water management.
terms.sldefinition: Podtalnica predstavlja več kot 95% vseh uporabnih sladkovodnih virov na Zemlji; več kot polovica svetovnega prebivalstva je odvisna od podtalnice kot vira pitne vode. Ta nevidni vir je zelo občutljiv na onesnaževanje in čezmerno rabo. Učinkovita ohranitev zalog podtalnice zahteva gospodarjenje z vodo usklajeno z ustrezno rabo tal.

terms.definition: Establishing or determining environmental goals or objectives.
terms.sldefinition: Osnovanje oziroma določanje okoljskih namenov in ciljev.

terms.definition: The entire sequence of events involved in the development of an individual organism.
terms.sldefinition: Nepretrgan niz dogodkov razvoja posameznega organizma.

terms.definition: Property tax. A tax laid upon the legal or beneficial owner of real property, and apportioned upon the assessed value of his land.
terms.sldefinition: Davek na posest. Davek, ki ga mora plačati zakoniti lastnik ali poverjenec nepremičnine. Višina davka je odvisna od ocenjene vrednosti njegovega zemljišča.

terms.definition: Any relatively unobstructed field of cultivated and mown grass, especially near a house or in a park.
terms.sldefinition: Vsako pretežno neograjeno polje kultivirane in košene trave, zlasti v bližini hiš ali v parku.

terms.definition: A series of transformations or biological events which follow one after the other one, reaching at the end of the cycle the initial conditions, as in the life cycle of many animal and plant organisms.
terms.sldefinition: Vrsta preobrazb ali bioloških pojavov, ki sledijo drug drugemu ter na koncu dosežejo začetno stanje, kot npr. v življenjskem ciklu mnogih živalskih in rastlinskih organizmov.

terms.definition: Any of the conditions in which people live. Also all human settlements in villages, towns or major cities, which require environmental management to provide water, public spaces, remove public wastes, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Razmere, v katerih živijo ljudje. Vse človekove naselbine v obliki vasi, krajev ali velikih mest, ki morajo za oskrbo z vodo, zagotavljanje javnih površin, odstranjevanje komunalnih odpadkov, itd., ustrezno upravljati z okoljem.

terms.definition: A process in which an increasing proportion of a country's population is concentrated in urban areas.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek, ko je povečan del prebivalstva neke dežele zbran v urbanih predelih.

terms.definition: A plot of cultivated ground adjacent to a dwelling and usually devoted in whole or in part to the growing of herbs, fruits, flowers, or vegetables for household use.
terms.sldefinition: Obdelano zemljišče, ki pripada bivališču in je delno ali v celoti namenjeno gojenju zelišč, rož ali zelenjave za domačo uporabo.

terms.definition: The process of forming visible images directly or indirectly by the action of light or other forms of radiation on sensitive surfaces.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek izdelave vidnih slik neposredno ali posredno z delovanjem svetlobe ali drugih oblik sevanja na občutljivo površino.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Waste pieces or disused articles of wrought iron (wrought-iron scrap) suitable for reworking for rolling or forging.
terms.sldefinition: Odpadni deli ali artikli iz kovanega železa, ki niso več v uporabi (staro železo). Primerni za predelavo v valjarnah ali kovnicah.

terms.definition: The act of formally expressing an opinion or choice in some matter or for some candidate, usually by voice or ballot.
terms.sldefinition: Dejanje formalno izraženega mnenja oziroma izbire o neki zadevi ali kandidatu, ponavadi z glasom oziroma glasovnico.

terms.definition: The buildings, machinery, facilities, related to agricultural production.
terms.sldefinition: Zgradbe, mehanizacija, proizvodni objekti in naprave, ki so v zvezi s kmetijsko proizvodnjo.

terms.definition: The programmatic use of a government's spending and revenue-generating activities to influence the economy and achieve specific objectives.
terms.sldefinition: Uporaba vladnih zbranih in porabljenih sredstev v okviru sprejetih programov za vplivanje na gospodarstvo in doseganje določenih rezultatov.

terms.definition: Political course of action aiming at establishing trade agreements among the states.
terms.sldefinition: Politični potek dogodkov, ki težijo k vzpostavitvi trgovinskih sporazumov med državami.

terms.definition: A system in which nations or blocs of nations strive to maintain an equilibrium of power to prevent dominance by any single nation or to reduce conflict or the possibility of war.
terms.sldefinition: Sistem, kjer si narodi ali združbe narodov prizadevajo vzdrževati ravnovesje moči, da bi tako preprečili dominantnost določenega naroda, ali da bi zmanjšali možnost konflikta ali vojne.

terms.definition: The financial resources or income of the European Community, a body of people organized into a political unity.
terms.sldefinition: Finančna sredstva ali prihodki Evropske unije, skupnosti ljudi, ki so organizirani v politično unijo.

terms.definition: The specific manner, form and institutions by which a government's ability to make, enforce and interpret laws are brought together into a coordinated whole.
terms.sldefinition: Posebni načini, oblike in ustanove, s katerimi so v usklajeno celoto združene vladen možnosti, izdelave, izvajanja in razlaganja zakonov.

terms.definition: 1) Title to or an interest in any property. 2) Any interest or privilege recognized and protected by law.
terms.sldefinition: 1) Pravna zahteva ali pravica do nekega imetja. 2) Vsaka pravica ali privilegij, ki je pripoznan in zaščiten z zakonom.

terms.definition: The underlying framework, including transportation and communications systems, industrial facilities, education and technology, that enables a country or region to produce goods, services and other resources with exchange value.
terms.sldefinition: Osnovni okvir, ki obsega transportne in komunikacijske sisteme, industrijske zmogljivosti, izobraževanje in tehnologijo, ter omogoča državi ali regiji, da proizvaja blago, storitve in druge vire z menjalno vrednostjo.

terms.definition: Distribution of material goods to consumers, through retailing and wholesaling.
terms.sldefinition: Distribucija blaga kupcem skozi prodajo na drobno in na debelo.

terms.definition: The different modes in which countries, nations, etc., are brought together by financial, currency, or pecuniary interests.
terms.sldefinition: Različni načini, s katerimi so dežele, narodi itd. povezani s finančnimi, valutnimi in denarnimi zadevami.

terms.definition: The study, policies or system of institutions and procedures by which a country or region's commerce is supplied with notes, coins, bank deposits or other equivalent mediums of exchange.
terms.sldefinition: Preučevanje, taktike ali sistem institucij in postopkov, preko katerih je dežela ali regija preskrbljena z bankovci, kovanci, bančnimi vlogami in drugimi ustreznimi sredstvi menjave.

terms.definition: The unrestrained flow of cash, funds, and other means of wealth between countries with different currencies.
terms.sldefinition: Neoviran pretok denarja, sredstev in drugega premoženja med državami z različno denarno valuto.

terms.definition: The underlying structure that connects and supports the various members and parts of a community or human organization.
terms.sldefinition: Osnovne strukture, ki povezujejo in podpirajo različne člane in dele skupnosti ali organizacije.

terms.definition: The monies and programs a society enacts through either public or private entities to provide economic security and general welfare for its members, often on account of old age, unemployment, health, disability or death of a spouse, parent or other benefactor.
terms.sldefinition: Boni in programi, ki jih družba izvaja skozi javne ali zasebne organizacije, da bi omogočila ekonomsko varnost in splošni blagor svojim članom. Razlog za takšno pomoč je starost, nezaposlenost, zdravje, invalidnost, smrt zakonca, roditelja ali drugega skrbnika.

terms.definition: A group or association of persons united to address the concerns, methods and professional status of instructors or educators.
terms.sldefinition: Skupina ali zveza več ljudi, združenih v ukvarjanju z zadevami, metodami in poklicnim statusom učiteljev ali vzgojiteljev.

terms.definition: A particular legal arrangement for owning a firm, the principal forms are sale trades, partnerships and companies/corporations; collective term for the system, function, process of planning, providing, coordinating, directing all efforts and resources in a business in order to achieve its goals.
terms.sldefinition: Določen pravni sporazum, ki vsebuje lastništvo podjetja, kjer so osnovne oblike trgovanje, partnerstva in gospodarske družbe/korporacije; skupni izraz za sistem, delovanje, postopek načrtovanja, pridobitve, koordinacije, usmeritve vseh vloženih naporov in virov v podjetništvu, z namenom doseči zastavljene cilje.

terms.definition: The categorization of enterprises or organizations involved in an economy.
terms.sldefinition: Kategorizacija podjetij ali organizacij, ki so vključene v gospodarstvu.

terms.definition: The type, structure or purpose of an institution as arranged, required and defined by local or national laws to determine the appropriate governmental regulations, privileges and tax status applicable to that institution.
terms.sldefinition: Tip, struktura, ali namen institucije, kar je urejeno, zahtevano in definirano s strani lokalnih predpisov ali državnih zakonov, s čimer zagotovijo primerne državne predpise, posebne pravice in davčni status, ustrezne za to institucijo.

terms.definition: Cultivation of land for the production of plant crops. Agricultural land may be employed in an unimproved state with few, if any, management inputs (extensive rangeland), or in an intensively managed state with annual inputs of fertilizer, pest, control treatments, and tillage.
terms.sldefinition: Obdelovanje zemlje za pridelavo kulturnih rastlin. Kmetijsko zemljišče se lahko obdeluje na način, ki ne zahteva izboljšav in malo ali nič vložka oz. skrbi (ekstenzivno poljedelstvo), ali na intenziven način, z vsakoletnim vložkom gnojil, z zatiranjem škodljivcev in oranjem.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Industry dealing with the production, processing, and supply of agricultural food products.
terms.sldefinition: Industrija, ki se ukvarja s proizvodnjo, predelavo kmetijskih živil ter oskrbo z njimi.

terms.definition: The geography of people making a living, dealing with the spatial patterns of production, distribution and consumption of goods and services. The development of economic geography over the past three decades has witnessed the substitution of analysis for description, leading to an identification of the factors and an understanding of the processes affecting the spatial differentiation of economic activities over the earth's surface.
terms.sldefinition: Geografija, ki preučuje preživljanje ljudi, prostorske kazalce proizvodnje, distribucijo in potrošnjo blaga in storitev. Razvoj ekonomske geografije v zadnjih treh desetletjih je doživel spremembe, gre za nadomeščanje opisne analize z analizo prepoznavanja ključnih dejavnikov in se osredotoča na razumevanje procesov, ki vplivajo na prostorsko diferenciacijo gospodarskih aktivnosti na Zemljinem površju.

terms.definition: The financial facility or system by which goods and services are provided in return for deferred, instead of immediate, payment.
terms.sldefinition: Finančno delovanje ali sistem preko katerega se nudi blago in storitve v zameno za odloženo plačilo, v nasprotju s tistim, ki se plača takoj.

terms.definition: The quality or state of being free, especially to enjoy political and civil liberties.
terms.sldefinition: Kvaliteta ali stanje biti svoboden, uživati politične in civilne svoboščine.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Stored products ready for sale.
terms.sldefinition: Shranjeni proizvodi, ki so pripravljeni na prodajo.

terms.definition: Procedure by which a human or other animal is made incapable of reproduction.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek, s katerim ljudje ali žival postanejo neplodni.

terms.definition: The use of financial resources for the purpose of incorporating ecological principles in the operations of businesses and companies.
terms.sldefinition: Raba finančnih virov za uvedbo ekoloških načel v delovanju podjetij in gospodarskih družb.

terms.definition: The accumulated volume or biomass remaining from gross production after accounting for losses due to respiration during production, herbivory, litterfall, and other factors that decrease the remaining available biomass.
terms.sldefinition: Nakopičena količina ali biomasa (pre)ostanka celotne produkcije po odbitku izgub zaradi škode, ki jo storijo rastlinojedi, propadanja materiala in ostalih dejavnikov, ki znižajo preostalo razpoložljivo biomaso.

terms.definition: The activity of finding solutions for troublesome or perplexing situations involving ecological or natural resources.
terms.sldefinition: Iskanje rešitev za problematične ali zapletene situacije, ki vključujejo ekološke ali naravne vire.

terms.definition: Plants used to feed livestock.
terms.sldefinition: Rastline, uporabljene za krmljenje živine.

terms.definition: Plants employed in industry, e.g. cotton, flax, hemp, peanuts, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Rastline, ki se uporabljajo v industrij. Na primer bombaž, lan, konoplja, zemeljski orešek, itd.

terms.definition: Plant producing material suitable to be made into cloths.
terms.sldefinition: Rastline, ki proizvajajo snovi, primerne za izdelovanje oblek.

terms.definition: Plants growing in tropical areas in conditions of constant rain and high temperature.
terms.sldefinition: Rastlinje tropskih področij, kjer so stanovitne padavine in visoke temperature.

terms.definition: Property of agricultural land and anything permanently affixed to the land, such as buildings, fences, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Lastništvo nad kmetijskim zemljiščem in vsem, kar je trajno postavljeno na zemljišče, kot so zgradbe, ograje, itd.
