terms.definition: As defined by the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization, an agricultural holding is simply a basic unit for agricultural production.
terms.sldefinition: Po definiciji FAO (Organizacija za kmetijstvo in prehrano Združenih narodov), je kmetijsko posestvo osnovna celica za kmetijsko proizvodnjo.

terms.definition: The manner in which land is owned and possessed, i.e. of title to its use.
terms.sldefinition: Način lastništva ali posedovanja zemlje.

terms.definition: The physical earth and its surroundings, consisting of the oceans and inland waters, lower and upper atmosphere, space, land masses and land forms.
terms.sldefinition: Fizika trdne Zemlje in njene okolica, ki je sestavljena iz oceanov in celinskih voda, nižjih in višjih plasti ozračja, vesolja, kopenskih mas in oblik površja.

terms.definition: Chemicals manufactured from the products of oil refineries, based largely on ethylene, propylene and butylene produced in the cracking of petrol fractions.
terms.sldefinition: Kemikalije, izdelane iz proizvodov naftnih rafinerij, osnovane so zlasti na etilenu, propilenu in butilenu, ki nastajajo ob delitvi bencinskih frakcij.

terms.definition: Various fine chemical products like glue, adhesives, resins, rubber, plastic compounds, selective herbicide, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Različni fini kemični izdelki kot lepila, adhezivi, smole, gume, plastične spojine, izbrani herbicidi itd.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Food which has been treated to improve its appearance or to prevent it going bad.
terms.sldefinition: Živila z obdelavo za boljši izgled in večjo trajnost.

terms.definition: Food so prepared and presented as to be easily and quickly ready for consumption.
terms.sldefinition: Hrana, ki je pripravljena in predstavljena tako, da se lahko hitro uporabi.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Plants which store edible material in a root, corm or tuber; root crops used as food vegetables or fodder include carrots, parsnips, swedes and turnips; starchy root crops include potatoes, cassavas and yams.
terms.sldefinition: Rastline, ki jedilne snovi hranijo v korenini, korenu ali gomolju. Gomoljevke, ki se uporabljajo kot zelenjava ali krma, so korenje, pastinaki, švedska repa in bela repa. Škrobaste gomoljevke so krompirji, kasave in sladki krompirji.

terms.definition: Any overall structure or set-up used to organize the activity of preparing land or soil for the growth of new crops, or the activity of promoting or improving the growth of existing crops.
terms.sldefinition: Celotna struktura ali postavitev, ki se uporablja za pripravo zemljišča ali tal za setev novih posevkov, ali pa za pospeševanje in izboljšanje rasti že obstoječih kulturnih rastlin.

terms.definition: The act or process of yielding produce from farmland, for livestock or human consumption.
terms.sldefinition: Proces pridelave kmetijskih pridelkov za živino ali človeško porabo.

terms.definition: Refers to all the structures (fishing vessels, trawling nets, factory ships, catcher boats, etc.) used in fishing industry.
terms.sldefinition: Izraz se nanaša na vso strukturo ribiške industrije (ribiške ladje, mreže, ladje za predelavo rib, itd.).

terms.definition: Area of sea or freshwater where fish are caught.
terms.sldefinition: Območje morja ali sladke vode, kjer se lovi ribe.

terms.definition: Industry related with the technical and mechanical activity of removing coal from the earth and preparing it for market.
terms.sldefinition: Industrija, ki se ukvarja s predelavo in izkopom premoga iz zemlje ga pošlje na trg.

terms.definition: Industry which converts various types of fuels as well as solar, water, tidal, and geothermal energy into other energy forms for a variety of household, commercial, transportation, and industrial application.
terms.sldefinition: Veja industrije, ki pretvarja različne vrste goriv, kot tudi sončno, vodno, bibavično in geotermalno energijo v druge oblike energije za uporabo v stanovanjih, gospodarstvu, prometu in industriji.
NULL

terms.definition: A sector of the economy in which an aggregate of commercial enterprises is engaged in the design, manufacture and marketing of electronic machines designed to accept information or data that is easily manipulated for some result based on a program or some set of instructions, and the technology or materials used with these machines, such as storage devices, terminals and peripheral equipment.
terms.sldefinition: Gospodarski sektor, v katerem so združena komercialna podjetja, ki se ukvarjajo z oblikovanjem, proizvodnjo in oglaševanjem elektronskih naprav. Slednje so namenjene sprejemanju informacij in podatkov, s katerimi lahko pridemo do določenih rezultatov, če sledimo določenemu programu ali zbirki navodil. Ta podjetja se ukvarjajo tudi z oblikovanjem, proizvodnjo in oglaševanjem tehnologije ali materialov, ki so povezana s temi elektronskimi napravami, na primer naprave za shranjevanje podatkov, terminali in dodatna oprema.
NULL

terms.definition: The containment, protection, handling and presentation of goods for the market.
terms.sldefinition: Zadrževanje, zaščita, trgovanje in predstavitev dobrin za trg.

terms.definition: Research and development, design, manufacture and measurement of high accuracy components and systems. It is related to mechanical, electronic, optical and production engineering, physics, chemistry, and computer and materials science.
terms.sldefinition: Raziskave, razvoj, oblikovanje, izdelava in meritve izredno natančnih sestavnih delov in sistemov. Povezano je z mehanskim, elektronskim, optičnim in proizvodnim inženirstvom, fiziko, kemijo ter računalniško in matematično vedo.

terms.definition: Any technical means or equipment used for the production and optimization of material goods that consist of any of a diverse range of properties, either alone or in combination, such as glass, metal, plastics and ceramics.
terms.sldefinition: Vsa tehnična sredstva ali pripomočki, ki se uporabljajo za proizvodnjo in optimizacijo materialnih dobrin in so sestavljeni iz kakšne izmed raznolikih lastnosti, iz ene same ali več kombiniranih, na primer iz stekla, kovine, plastike in keramike.

terms.definition: Equipment necessary to the performance of military activities, either combat or noncombat.
terms.sldefinition: Oprema, ki je potrebna za izvrševanje vojaških vojnih ali mirnodobnih dejavnosti.

terms.definition: Equipment designed to aid in learning and teaching by making use of both hearing and sight.
terms.sldefinition: Oprema, narejena za pomoč pri učenju z uporabo sluha in vida.

terms.definition: A group of parts or machines arranged to perform a useful function.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek delov ali strojev, povezanih za opravljanje koristnega opravila.

terms.definition: Machines and tools employed in manual and mechanical labour.
terms.sldefinition: Stroji in orodja, ki se uporabljajo pri ročnem in strojnem delu.

terms.definition: Equipment operating with an internal pressure greater than atmospheric.
terms.sldefinition: Oprema, ki deluje s pomočjo notranjega pritiska, večjega od atmosferskega.

terms.definition: Equipment related to the production of heat.
terms.sldefinition: Pripomočki, ki so del proizvajanja toplote.

terms.definition: To make or process (a raw material) into a finished product, especially by means of a large-scale industrial operation.
terms.sldefinition: Izdelati ali predelati (surovine) v končni izdelek, še posebno z obsežno industrijsko dejavnostjo.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Any profit-seeking undertaking or venture that involves the production, sale and purchase of goods or services.
terms.sldefinition: Vsaka dobičkonosna dejavnost ali podvig, ki vključuje proizvodnjo, prodajo in nakup dobrin ali storitev.

terms.definition: A specialized division of a business or other organization.
terms.sldefinition: Specializirana delitev podjetja ali druge organizacije.
NULL

terms.definition: The aggregation of services, including construction, development, maintenance and leasing, performed for human-occupied properties, such as office buildings and apartment houses.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek storitev, ki se izvajajo za bivanje človeka, vključno z gradnjo, razvojem, vzdrževanjem in dajanjem v najem poslovnih stavb in stanovanjskih hiš.

terms.definition: Type of vehicle used for moving from one place to the other.
terms.sldefinition: Sredstvo oz. vrsta vozila, ki služi za premikanje z enega kraja na drugega.

terms.definition: The targeted place to which persons, materials or commodities are conveyed over land, water or through the air.
terms.sldefinition: Ciljno mesto prevažanja oseb, materialov ali dobrin po kopnem, vodi oz. po zraku.

terms.definition: The process by which the environment is progressively contaminated, overexploited and destroyed.
terms.sldefinition: Proces, v katerem je okolje vedno bolj onesnaženo, izrabljeno in uničeno.

terms.definition: A schedule of revenues and expenditures for a specific time period that is devised by the European Community, a body of people organized into a political unity.
terms.sldefinition: Načrt prihodkov in izdatkov za določeno obdobje, ki ga določi Evropska unija, skupnost ljudi, organiziranih v politično unijo.

terms.definition: Any form of financial assistance or inducement for persons or institutions.
terms.sldefinition: Poljubna oblika finančne pomoči ali spodbude za ljudi ali ustanov.

terms.definition: The system of setting up, maintaining, and auditing the books of a firm and of analyzing its financial status and operating results.
terms.sldefinition: Sistem vzpostavljanja, vzdrževanja in pregledovanja knjig v podjetju ter analiziranje finančnega stanja in rezultatov dela.

terms.definition: The production of estimates of future financial and commercial trends, based on econometric models or surveys.
terms.sldefinition: Izdelava ocen o prihodnjih finančnih in gospodarskih trendih, ki temeljijo na ekonometričnih modelih ali raziskavah.

terms.definition: An official list or schedule setting forth the duties imposed by a government on imported or exported goods.
terms.sldefinition: Uraden seznam ali razpored, ki v ospredje postavlja dajatve, ki jih je uvedla vlada za uvoženo ali izvoženo blago.

terms.definition: The conduct or carrying on of trade, business or a financial matter to a conclusion or settlement.
terms.sldefinition: Izvajanje ali nadaljevanje trgovine, poslov ali finančnih zadev v okviru zastavljenega cilja ali dogovora.

terms.definition: A course of action or procedure regarding compensation or recompensation for work done or services rendered.
terms.sldefinition: Postopki v zvezi s plačili ali nadomestili za opravljeno delo ali storitev.

terms.definition: An organization established in Europe in 1979 to coordinate financial policy and exchange rates for the continent by running the Exchange Rate Mechanism (ERM) and assisting movement toward a common European currency and a central European bank.
terms.sldefinition: Organizacija, ki je bila v Evropi ustanovljena leta 1979 z namenom koordinirati finančno politiko in menjalniške tečaje na celini, s pogonom mehanizma za menjalniške tečaje (ERM), in pripomoči k ustanovitvi skupne evropske valute ter Evropske centralne banke.

terms.definition: A financial market that trades Treasury bills, commercial paper and other short-term financial instruments. This market is often used by businesses when they need short-term funds to bridge the gap between paying operating costs and collecting revenue from product sales. As such, the term "money" in money market indicates that businesses are using highly liquid instruments to raise the money need for operating expenses.
terms.sldefinition: Finančni trg, ki kupčuje z menicami, delnicami in drugimi kratkoročnimi vrednostnimi papirji. Ta trg pogosto uporabljajo podjetja, ko potrebujejo kratkoročne fonde za premoščanje vrzeli med plačilom obratovalnih stroškov in vnovčitvijo dohodkov od prodanih proizvodov. Tako termin "denar" na denarnem trgu naznači, da podjetja uporabljajo visoko likvidne vrednostne papirje, da zberejo denar za obratovalne izdatke.

terms.definition: Course of action or procedure by government, business, or an individual concerning trade activities.
terms.sldefinition: Postopki ali procedura, ki jo uvede vlada, podjetje ali posameznik, ki se nanaša na trgovino.

terms.definition: An official course of action adopted by a business, financial institution or state to regulate, restrict or increase deferred payment arrangements for goods, services or money.
terms.sldefinition: Uraden potek dogodkov, ki ga sprejme podjetje, finančna institucija ali država z namenom, da ureja, omejuje ali podaljša dogovor o odlogu plačila za blago, storitve ali denar.

terms.definition: The total amount of all government securities outstanding. This is also frequently termed government debt.
terms.sldefinition: Celotna vsota vseh vladnih neplačanih vrednostnih papirjev. To je tudi pogosta oznaka za vladne dolgove.

terms.definition: A sum of money demanded from businesses by a government, usually based on a percentage of total sales of select goods and services, and generally passed on to consumers with each individual purchase.
terms.sldefinition: Vsota denarja, ki ga od podjetja zahteva vlada. Višina vsote je ponavadi osnovana na odstotku od celotne prodaje izbranih blaga in storitev, ponavadi z vsakim posameznim nakupom preide na kupca.

terms.definition: A government imposed levy on the wealth or assets gained by an individual, firm, or corporation for the purpose of raising revenue to pay for services or improvements for the general public benefit.
terms.sldefinition: Vladni davki na premoženje oziroma dobičke posameznika, podjetij ali družb. Namen pobiranja davkov je zvišanje državnega dohodka za plačevanje služb in izboljšav za javno dobro.

terms.definition: A tax on the annual profits arising from property, business pursuits, professions, trades or offices.
terms.sldefinition: Davek na letni dohodek, ki izvira iz posesti, poslov, poklicev, obrti ali služb.

terms.definition: The use of government tax and spending policies to achieve desired macroeconomic goals. Accordingly, they involve discretionary efforts to adjust governmental tax and spending to induce changes in economic incentives and, hence, to stabilize fluctuations in aggregate demand.
terms.sldefinition: Raba vladnih davkov in način porabe za dosego zaželenih makroekonomskih ciljev. To vključuje neomejena prizadevanja za prilagoditev vladnih davkov in porabe za sprožanje sprememb v gospodarskih spodbudah, da se s tem stabilizira nestalnosti celotnega povpraševanja.

terms.definition: The amount of money or monetary rate at which agricultural goods and services can be bought or sold.
terms.sldefinition: Denarni znesek ali cena, za katero je moč kupiti ali prodati kmetijske pridelke in storitve.

terms.definition: The price actually given in current market dealings; the actual price at which given stock or commodity is currently sold in the usual and ordinary course of trade and competition between sellers and buyers.
terms.sldefinition: Dejanska cena na trenutnem trgu. Dejanska cena, po kateri so delnice ali blago prodani v običajnem poteku trgovanja in tekmovanja med prodajalci ter kupci.

terms.definition: The outlay or expenditure involved in moving goods from one place to another.
terms.sldefinition: Strošek oziroma izdatek ob premikanju dobrin z enega kraja na drugega.

terms.definition: The guiding procedure, philosophy, or course of action for decisions regarding the monetary rate or value for goods and services.
terms.sldefinition: Smernice, miselnost ali postopki odločanja, ki zadevajo predpisano ceno ali vrednost blaga in storitev.

terms.definition: The extent to which a market is taken up by producers within a given industry.
terms.sldefinition: Stopnja zavzetosti trga od proizvajalcev v neki industrijski dejavnosti.

terms.definition: The type of organization of a company. Three kinds of structure are usually recognized: centralized, formal or hierarchical.
terms.sldefinition: Vrsta organizacije v podjetju. Poznamo tri vrste strukture: centralizirano, uradno in hierarhično.

terms.definition: The management of acquisitions and the use of long- and short-term capital by a business.
terms.sldefinition: Ravnanje s prihodki in raba dolgoročnega ali kratkoročnega kapitala določenega podjetja.

terms.definition: The collection and processing of financial information to assist with the handling, direction, or control of an organization.
terms.sldefinition: Zbiranje in obdelava finančnih podatkov za pomoč pri vodenju, usmerjanju in nadzorovanju neke organizacije.

terms.definition: The guiding procedure, philosophy or course of action for an enterprise or company organized for commercial purposes.
terms.sldefinition: Vodstveni postopek, miselnost ali tok dogodkov posameznega podjetja, ki se izvaja v komercialne namene.

terms.definition: Article 85(1) of the EEC Treaty prohibits all agreements between undertakings, decisions by associations of undertakings and concerted practices which may affect trade between member states and which have as their object or effect the prevention, restriction or distortion of competition within the common market. All such arrangements are automatically null and void under Article 85(2), unless exempted by the Commission pursuant to Article 85(3). The text of Article 85 is as follows: "1. The following shall be prohibited as incompatible with the common market: all agreements between undertakings, decisions by associations of undertakings and concerted practices which may affect trade between member states and which have as their object or effect the prevention, restriction or distortion of competition within the common market, and in particular those which: (a) directly or indirectly fix purchase or selling prices or any other trading conditions; (b) limit or control production, markets, technical development, or investment; (c) share markets or sources of supply; (d) apply dissimilar conditions to equivalent transactions with other trading parties, thereby placing them at a competitive disadvantage; (e) make the conclusion of contracts subject to acceptance by the other parties of supplementary obligations which, by their nature or according to commercial usage, have no connection with the subject of such contracts.
terms.sldefinition: Člen 85(1) Pogodbe EES prepoveduje vse sporazume med podjetji, odločitve skupnosti podjetji in usklajene postopke, ki bi lahko vplivali na trgovino med državami članicami, z namenom preprečiti, omejiti, popačiti konkurenco na skupnem trgu. Po členu 85(2) so vsi takšni sporazumi so nični in neveljavni, razen če niso izvzeti s strani Komisije v skladu s členom 85(3). Člen 85 pravi: "Sledeče bo prepovedano zaradi neskladnosti s skupnim trgom: vsi sporazumi med podjetji, odločitve skupnosti podjetij in usklajeni postopki, ki bi lahko vplivali na trgovino med državami članicami, z namenom preprečevanja, omejevanja in popačenja konkurence znotraj skupnega trga in posebej še: (a) direktno ali posredno določanje cen ali drugih pogojev trgovanja, (b) omejevanje ali nadzorovanje proizvodnje, trgov, tehničnega razvoja ali investiranja, (c ) delitev trgov ali virov oskrbe; (d) uporaba različnih pogojev pri ekvivalentnih transakcijah z drugimi partnerji, ki se jih s tem spravi v konkurenci v neugoden položaj; (e) uvrstiti v pogodbene pogoje klavzule, ki zahtevajo privolitev strank v naknadne obveznosti, ki nimajo po svoji naravi ali tržni uporabi nikakršne zveze s predmetom pogodbe.

terms.definition: The part of the national law of a country that establishes rules for dealing with cases involving a foreign element.
terms.sldefinition: Notranje pravo posamezne države, ki ureja civilnopravna razmerja s tujepravnimi sestavinami.

terms.definition: The general rules and principles pertaining to the conduct of nations and of international organizations and with the relations among them.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek pravnih norm, ki urejajo predvsem odnose med državami oz. vladnimi mednarodnimi organizacijami. Viri mednarodnega prava so enostranske mednarodnopravne izjave, mednarodne pogodbe in mednarodno običajno pravo.

terms.definition: The recognized rules guiding the commercial relations of at least two sovereign states or private parties involved in cross-border transactions, including regulations for trade, finance and intellectual property.
terms.sldefinition: Priznan pravilnik, ki ureja trgovinske odnose vsaj dveh suverenih držav ali samostojnih subjektov, ki se ukvarjajo s čezmejnimi transakcijami. Mednarodni gospodarski zakon vključuje predpise o trgovini, financah in intelektualni lastnini.
NULL

terms.definition: Any contract in which there are public funds provided though private persons may perform the contract and the subject of the contract may ultimately benefit private persons.
terms.sldefinition: Vsaka pogodba, za katero so namenjena javna sredstva. Pogodbo lahko izpolnijo zasebniki. Predmet pogodbe lahko koristi zasebnikom.

terms.definition: A body of rules or orders generally issued by the executive authority of a government to establish and direct the taxes, duties or tariffs payable upon merchandise exported or imported.
terms.sldefinition: Pravilnik, ki ga ponavadi izda izvršna oblast vlade za vzpostavljanje in upravljanje z davki, carinami ali dajatvami, ki se jih določi za izvozno ali uvozno blago.

terms.definition: Branch of specialty of law, also denominated "domestic relations" law, concerned with such subjects as adoption, annulment, divorce, separation, paternity, custody, support and child care.
terms.sldefinition: Posebna veja prava, imenovana tudi pravo "družinskih razmerij", ki pokriva zadeve kot so posvojitev, razveljavitev, ločitev, odtujitev, ugotavljanje očetovstva, varstvo, podpora in skrb za otroke.

terms.definition: A body of rules or orders prescribed by government or management for the safe and orderly movement of vehicles on land, sea or in the air.
terms.sldefinition: Pravilnik ali predpisi, ki jih izdela vlada ali upravni organ za varno in urejeno gibanje prevoznih sredstev po zemlji, morju in zraku.

terms.definition: A body of rules or orders prescribed by government, management or an international organization or treaty pertaining to the cultivation of land, raising crops, or feeding, breeding and raising livestock.
terms.sldefinition: Pravilnik ali predpisi, ki jih izdela vlada, upravni organ, mednarodna organizacija ali meddržavni sporazum, ki se nanaša na kultiviranje zemlje, gojenje pridelka, hranjenje, vzgojo in rejo živine.

terms.definition: Binding rules and regulations pertaining to the construction, use and operation of jails, penitentiaries and other places of legal confinement and punishment.
terms.sldefinition: Obvezujoča pravila in predpisi, ki se nanašajo na gradnjo, uporabo in delovanje zaporov, kaznilnic in drugih ustanov za zakonit odvzem prostosti in kaznovanje.

terms.definition: The service provided by an owner agreeing to grant the temporary possession of specific housing in return for the payment of rent from the tenant.
terms.sldefinition: Storitev, s katero lastnik najemniku začasno odda bivalni prostor, v zameno za plačilo najemnine.
NULL

terms.definition: That part of the law dealing with matters such as those arising from monopolies and mergers, restrictive trading agreements, resale price maintenance and agreements involving distortion of competition affected by EU rules.
terms.sldefinition: Del zakonodaje, ki jo uveljavlja pravilnik EU, ki se ukvarja z monopoli in povezovanji družb, restriktivnimi trgovinskimi sporazumi, vzdrževanjem preprodajnih cen in sporazumi, ki vsebujejo izključitev konkurence.

terms.definition: Business operation or action that confines or limits the free exchange of goods and services within a country or between countries, which may include discrimination, exclusive dealings, collusion agreements or price fixing.
terms.sldefinition: Poslovne operacije ali dejanja, ki omejijo prosto izmenjavo blaga in storitev v deželi ali med deželami, pogosto sem spadajo diskriminatorne in ekskluzivne kupčije, tajni dogovori ali določanje cene.
NULL

terms.definition: A rule or order prescribed by government or management for the safe and orderly conveyance of persons, materials or commodities over land, water or through the air.
terms.sldefinition: Pravilo ali odredba, ki jo predpiše vlada ali uprava za varno in urejeno prevažanje ljudi, materialov ali blaga po zemlji, morju in zraku.

terms.definition: The directly applicable legislation of the European Community regulating the relations of member states.
terms.sldefinition: Neposredno uveljavljanje zakonodaje Evropske unije, ki zadeva odnose z državami članicami.
NULL

terms.definition: A judicial or administrative interpretation of a provision of a statute, order, regulation, or ordinance. May also refer to judicial determination of admissibility of evidence, allowance of motion, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Sodna oziroma uradna razlaga odločbe statuta, sklepa, uredbe ali pravilnika. Lahko se nanaša tudi na sodno določbo o sprejemljivosti dokazov, na dovoljenje za gibanje ipd.

terms.definition: Term includes all proceedings authorised or sanctioned by law, and brought or instituted in a court of legal tribunal, for the acquiring of a right or the enforcement of a remedy.
terms.sldefinition: Termin vključuje vse postopke, ki jih avtorizira ali sankcionira zakon, in so lahko izvršeni preko sodišča za dosego upravičenega ali uveljavljanje povrnitve škode.

terms.definition: The right of citizens to access to the organs of the governments where justice is administered.
terms.slterm: dostop do sodišč, dostop do sodnega varstva
terms.sldefinition: Pravica dostopa državljanov do vladnih organov, pristojnih za sodstvo in sodno varstvo.

terms.definition: Term used in commercial law, including a corporation, government or governmental subdivision or agency, business trust, estate, trust, partnership or association, two or more persons having a joint or common interest, or any other legal or commercial entity.
terms.sldefinition: Izraz, ki se uporablja v gospodarskem pravu, vključuje korporacije, vlado ali vladne pododdelke in urade, poslovna združenja, posesti, dobrodelne ustanove, partnerstva in zveze; dve ali več oseb, združenih zaradi skupnih interesov, ali katerokoli drugo obliko pravne ali trgovinske entitete.

terms.definition: A body of persons whose occupation is concerned with advising clients in matters of law, representing them in court or assisting them through the judicial process, including, in the first instance, lawyers and, by extension, judges, legal assistants and court employees.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek ljudi, katerih poklic je povezan s svetovanjem odjemalcem v pravnih zadevah, z zastopanjem strank pred sodiščem ali s pomočjo strankam v pravdnem procesu. To so odvetniki, sodniki, pravni pomočniki in uslužbenci sodišča.

terms.definition: The organization and network of courts and other institutions, procedures and customs, officers and other personnel concerned with interpretation and enforcement of a country's law or with advice and assistance in matters pertaining to those laws.
terms.sldefinition: Organizacija in mreža sodišč ter drugih institucij, postopkov in običajev, uradnikov in drugega osebja, povezanega z razlago in uveljavitvijo državnega prava ali s funkcijo svetovanja in pomoči v zadevah, ki se nanašajo na pravo.
NULL

terms.definition: Any prescribed step or manner of proceeding that a law making body takes in proposing laws, resolutions or special acts before they can be enacted or passed.
terms.sldefinition: Katerikoli predpisan korak ali način ravnanja, ki zakonodajno telo vključi v predlaganje zakonov, resolucij ali posebnih zakonodajnih aktov preden so ti uzakonjeni ali sprejeti.

terms.definition: systematic approach or method of performance for the accomplishment of administrative goals or tasks.
terms.sldefinition: Sistematičen pristop ali metoda delovanja za dosego administrativnih ciljev ali nalog.

terms.definition: An organization's complex system of mutually connected and dependent elements or parts, which make up a definite manner of arrangement.
terms.sldefinition: Zapleten sistem med seboj povezanih in soodvisnih elementov ali delov v določeni organizaciji, ki določajo njeno ureditev.

terms.definition: The specific tasks, undertakings or functions that governments, businesses and other organizations perform.
terms.sldefinition: Določene naloge, obveznosti ali opravila, ki jih izvajajo vlade, podjetja in druge organizacije.

terms.definition: The set of uniform trade principles or practices established by an European Community customs union, which implements common tariff rates, tariff and trade agreements with non-member countries, import and export policies, and export promotion.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek enakih trgovskih principov in navad, ki jih je sprejela carinska unija Evropske skupnosti, ki izvaja enotne stopnje carinskih pristojbin, carinske in trgovske sporazume z državami, ki niso članice Evropske skupnosti, uvozno in izvozno politiko, in spodbuja izvoz.

terms.definition: A course of action adopted and pursued by member countries, in which it is agreed to impose a system of duties or tax charges on imports from non-member countries.
terms.sldefinition: Ukrepi, ki jih uvedejo in izvajajo države članice, za katere je domenjeno, da bodo uveljavljale sistem carin in davkov na izdelke, uvožene iz držav nečlanic.
NULL

terms.definition: A course of action adopted and pursued by government, business or some other organization, which plans or organizes for the maintenance, development and erection of houses, offices, bridges or other building structures.
terms.sldefinition: Predpisi, ki jih napiše in katere upošteva vlada, podjetje ali druga organizacija, ki načrtujejo ali organizirajo vzdrževanje, razvoj in postavitev hiš, pisarn, mostov ali drugih gradbenih konstrukcij.

terms.definition: Measures and practices adopted by governments relating to the management of communication media.
terms.sldefinition: Ukrepi in navade, ki jih uvedejo vlade v okviru upravljanja s komunikacijskimi mediji.

terms.definition: Measures and activities promoted by governments aiming at the structural definition of the productive apparatus.
terms.sldefinition: Ukrepi in dejavnosti, spodbujane s strani vlad, za strukturno označevanje izdelovalnih naprav.

terms.definition: A course of action adopted and pursued by government or some other organization, which seeks to support research and the exploration of planets, asteroids and other elements in the region beyond earth's atmosphere or beyond the solar system.
terms.sldefinition: Vrsta ukrepov, ki jih sprejme in izvaja vlada ali druga organizacija, ki si prizadeva za podporo preučevanja in raziskovanja planetov, asteroidov in drugih elementov v področju zunaj zemeljskega ozračja ali sončnega sistema.

terms.definition: A district or an administrative division of a city or territory that is designed according to some material, distributive or productive criteria.
terms.sldefinition: Okrožje ali administrativni del mesta ali ozemlja, ki je oblikovan glede na posamezne materialne, distributivne ali proizvodne kriterije.

terms.definition: A course of action adopted and pursued by government or some other organization that promotes or determines the allocation of assistance, support or relief, often from one country to another.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek, ki ga sprejme in izvaja vlada ali druga organizacija za spodbujanje ali določitev dodelitev pomoči ali podpore, pogosto iz ene države v drugo.

terms.definition: The support or relief given to save human lives or to alleviate suffering, including public health efforts and the provision of financial resources and food, often when governmental authorities are unable or unwilling to provide for such assistance.
terms.sldefinition: Podpora ali pomoč, ki se pošlje z namenom rešiti človeška življenja ali ublažiti trpljenje. Vključuje zdravstveno pomoč, finančna sredstva ter hrano. Pogosto se pošlje takrat, ko vlada ni sposobna ali pa ne želi pomagati.

terms.definition: A controversy, disagreement, quarrel or warfare between or among two or more nations or countries, often requiring involvement or monitoring by other members of the global community.
terms.sldefinition: Polemika, nesoglasje, spor ali uvedba vojnega stanja med dvema ali več narodi, oziroma državami. Pogosto zahteva posredovanje ali nadzorovanje drugih članic svetovne skupnosti.

terms.definition: The activities to prevent, contain, moderate and/or terminate the hostilities between or within States, through the medium of an impartial third party intervention, organised and directed internationally. This intervention is conducted using military forces, police and civilians with the consent of the main belligerents, to complement the diplomatic conflict resolution process and, to restore and maintain peace.
terms.sldefinition: Dejavnosti za preprečevanje, obvladovanje, umiritev in/ali končanje sovražnosti med državami ali v državi s pomočjo posredovanja nepristranske, mednarodno organizirane in vodene tretje stranke. Posredovanje poteka s pomočjo vojaških sil, policije in civilistov ter s pristankom glavnih vojskujočih se sil, kot dopolnitev k diplomatskemu reševanju konflikta, obnovitve in vzdrževanja miru.

terms.definition: Procedure or course of action taken to curb or reduce human-made or human-alteration of the physical, biological, chemical and radiological integrity of air, water and other media.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek ali potek dejanja za omejevanje ali zmanjševanje človeških posegov in sprememb fizikalne, biološke, kemične in radiološke neokrnjenosti zraka, vode in drugih medijev.

terms.definition: A position along a scale of increasingly advanced training marking the degree or grade of instruction either obtained by an individual, offered by a some entity or necessary for a particular job or task.
terms.sldefinition: Položaj na lestvici izobraževanja, na kateri so zaznamovane stopnje in nazivi doseženih izobraževanj posameznika, ponujenih izobraževanj učne ustanove, ali zahtev za specifično nalogo ali službo.

terms.definition: Informal learning or formal instruction with broad application to human existence beyond the domain of any particular subject or discipline, often equated with liberal arts in the university setting and contrasted to courses required for a specific major or program.
terms.sldefinition: Neformalno učenje ali formalni pouk s široko uporabno vrednostjo za človekov obstoj, ki presega domeno določene tematike ali vede, pogosto enačenje s svobodnim izražanjem v univerzitetnem okolju, v primerjavi s predmeti, ki so potrebni za določen študijski program.

terms.definition: The material studied in or for an educational institution, comprising homework and work done in the classroom.
terms.sldefinition: Snov, ki se preučuje v ali za izobraževalno ustanovo, kar obsega domače naloge in delo v razredu.

terms.definition: Any part or the sum of experiences had while attending an instructional institution, or the amount of time spent in such a program.
terms.sldefinition: Vsak del ali količina pridobljenih izkušenj med obiskovanjem vzgojne ustanove ali količina prebitega časa v takem programu.

terms.definition: An article or device used to facilitate the learning process in an instructional setting.
terms.sldefinition: Članek ali naprava, ki se uporablja za pospeševanje učnega procesa v vzgojnih okoljih.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of people, devices or other resources providing written, printed or digitized items that furnish or substantiate information or evidence.
terms.sldefinition: Koordiniran zbor ljudi, naprav ali drugih virov, ki priskrbijo pisne, tiskane ali digitalne podatke, ki dopolnjujejo ali formirajo informacije ali dokaze.

terms.definition: The agents, instruments, methods or resources used to impart or interchange thoughts, opinions or information.
terms.sldefinition: Posredniki, priprave, metode in viri, ki se uporabljajo za izmenjavo ali vplivanje na misli, mnenja ali informacije.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of people, devices or other resources designed to exchange information and data by means of mutually understood symbols.
terms.sldefinition: Usklajena združba ljudi, naprav ali drugih virov, namenjenih za izmenjavo informacij in podatkov v obliki vzajemno razumljenih simbolov.

terms.definition: An assembly of computer hardware, firmware and software configured for the purpose of performing various operations on digital information elements with a minimum of human intervention.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek računalniške strojne opreme, osnovne programske opreme in druge programske opreme, ki je prirejen za izvajanje operacij na različnih elementih digitalnih podatkov ob minimalnem človekovem vmešavanju.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: The study of the behaviour of organisms.
terms.sldefinition: Preučevanje vedenja organizmov.
NULL
NULL
NULL

terms.definition: A person that suffers from the destructive action undertaken as a result of an armed conflict between two or more parties, particularly death, injury, hardship, loss of property or dislocation.
terms.sldefinition: Oseba, ki trpi zaradi uničevalnih dejanj, ki so posledica oboroženega spopada dveh ali več strank, gre za smrt, poškodbe, stisko, izgubo lastnine ali spremembo bivališča.

terms.definition: A population shift occurring within national or territorial boundaries, often characterized by persons seeking labor opportunities in more advantageous areas.
terms.sldefinition: Gibanje prebivalstva znotraj državnih ali administrativnih meja. Pogosto gre za osebe, ki iščejo delo na bolj razvitih območjih.

terms.definition: The number of inhabitants in or spread across designated subdivisions of an area, region, city or country.
terms.sldefinition: Število prebivalcev, ki so razporejeni na določenem območju, regiji, mestu ali državi.

terms.definition: The constituent groupings and proportions of the total inhabitants of a given nation, area, region or city, as seen from various perspectives.
terms.sldefinition: Razvrstitev skupin in njihovih deležev v sestavi celotnega prebivalstva nekega naroda, območja, regije ali mesta, gledano z različnih perspektiv.

terms.definition: Just claims, legal guarantees or moral principles accorded to each and every member of a group or state, including the freedom to do certain things and the freedom from certain intrusions imposed by the collective body.
terms.sldefinition: Upravičene zahteve, zakonita jamstva ali moralna načela, podeljena vsakemu predstavniku skupine oziroma države, sem sodi pravica svobodno početi nekatere stvari in pravica do svobodnega motenja, nečesa kar vsiljuje kolektivno telo.

terms.definition: The just claims and legal guarantees to access, participate in and profit from the production, distribution and use of property, intellectual property, income and wealth.
terms.sldefinition: Utemeljene zahteve in pravna jamstva za dostop, sodelovanje in udeležbo pri dobičku od proizvodnje, distribucije in uporabe lastnine, intelektualne lastnine, prihodkov in bogastva.

terms.definition: The general movement, drift or direction of change in a viewpoint collectively and purportedly held by a significant number of people.
terms.sldefinition: Splošno gibanje, težnja ali smer sprememb stališča, ki je za precejšnje število ljudi zbirno in daljnosežno.

terms.definition: A belief system that explains and justifies a preferred economic and governmental order for society, offers strategies for its maintenance or attainment and helps give meaning to public events, personalities and policies.
terms.sldefinition: Prepričanje, ki družbi razlaga in zagovarja izbran gospodarski in družbeni red, ponuja strategije za njegovo vzdrževanje ali dosego in pomaga dajati pomen javnim dogodkom, osebam in politiki.

terms.definition: The standing of an individual with regard to a legally recognized conjugal relationship, either in the present or past.
terms.sldefinition: Položaj posameznika z ozirom na pravno priznano zakonsko zvezo, najsi je to v sedanjosti ali v preteklosti.

terms.definition: A collection of people who interact and share a sense of unity on account of a common ethnic, ancestral, generational or regional identity.
terms.sldefinition: Kup ljudi, ki vplivajo na drug drugega in delijo občutek enotnosti zaradi etnične, podedovane, generacijske in regionalne istovetnosti.

terms.definition: The organization and proportions of the various job types and skill levels in an enterprise or economy.
terms.sldefinition: Organizacija in deleži raznih tipov zaposlitve in stopenj veščine v podjetništvu ali gospodarstvu.
NULL

terms.definition: The act or instrument by which the binding force of a contract is terminated, irrespective of whether the contract is carried out to the full extent contemplated or is broken off before complete execution.
terms.sldefinition: Dejanje oziroma listina, s katerim pogodba ni več zavezujoča, ne glede na to, če je bila pogodba izvršena v celoti ali pa je bila prekinjena pred popolno izvedbo.

terms.definition: The number of a particular region or nation's working population gainfully employed or otherwise occupied with the production of crops, livestock or poultry.
terms.sldefinition: Število delovnega prebivalstva v posameznem predelu ali celotnem narodu, ki je plačano zaposlen ali kako drugače udeležen v proizvodnji pridelka, živine ali perutnine.
NULL
NULL

terms.definition: 1) A place where tents, cabins, or other temporary structures are erected for the use of military troops, for training soldiers, etc. 2) Tents, cabins, etc., used as temporary lodgings by a group of travellers, holiday-makers, Scouts, Gypsies, etc.
terms.sldefinition: 1) Mesto, kjer se postavi šotore, kabine ali druge začasne objekte, ki jih uporablja vojska, npr. za vojaško usposabljanje, itd. 2) Šotori, kabine, itd., ki se jih popotniki, dopustniki, taborniki in skavti, Romi, itd. uporabljajo kot začasno bivališče.

terms.definition: The sloping side of any hollow in the ground, especially when bordering a river.
terms.sldefinition: Pobočje vsakovrstnih jam v tleh, še zlasti vzdolž rek.

terms.definition: The process of removing forest produce, particularly timber, fuelwood and bamboos, from its place of growth to some permanent or major delivery point, either for further transport or further manufacture, i.e. secondary conversion, or both.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek odstranjevanja gozdnih izdelkov, zlasti stavbnega lesa, drv in bambusa, iz kraja rasti na glavni oziroma stalen kraj za dostavo, lahko za nadaljnji prevoz, predelavo (sekundarna predelava) ali oboje.

terms.definition: Compensation for the use of a person's property, based on an agreed percentage of the income arising from its use.
terms.sldefinition: Nadomestilo za uporabo osebnega imetja, osnovano je na dogovorjenih odstotkih dobička.

terms.definition: A formal written record of transactions, proceedings, etc., as of a society, committee, or legislative body.
terms.sldefinition: Uraden pisni zapis razvoja dogodkov, postopkov, ipd., družbenega, komisijskega ali pravnega organa.

terms.definition: Waste matter discharged from the body of an animal.
terms.sldefinition: Odpadne snovi, ki jih izloči neka žival.
NULL

terms.definition: The upkeep of industrial facilities and equipment.
terms.sldefinition: Vzdrževanje industrijskih obratov in opreme.

terms.definition: A portion of space within a commercial establishment that is used for applying coloring substances to certain products or materials, providing a decorative or protective coating.
terms.sldefinition: Prostor v podjetju, ki se uporablja za nanašanje barvnih snovi na določene izdelke in materiale za dekorativen in zaščiten premaz.

terms.definition: A place where crystalline salt deposits are formed or found, such as a salt flat or pan, a salada, or a salt lick.
terms.sldefinition: Kraji, kjer se oblikujejo nahajališča kristalne soli ali kjer se kristalno sol lahko najde, kot so soline,... in solnice za živali.

terms.definition: A trail in the country along which one can walk, usually for pleasure or exercise.
terms.sldefinition: Steza na podeželju, kjer se lahko hodi. Velikokrat za užitek ali rekreacijo.

terms.definition: Any device or structure that conducts excess water or sewage from a conduit or container.
terms.sldefinition: Vsaka naprava ali sestava, ki upravlja z odvečno vodo ali odplakami iz vodovoda ali embalaže.

terms.definition: In plant propagation, young shoots or stems removed for the purpose of growing new plants by vegetatively rooting the cuttings.
terms.sldefinition: V gojenju rastlin, mladi poganjki ali stebla, ki se jih s sečnjo odstrani zaradi zasajanja novih rastlin.

terms.definition: An eco-balance refers to the consumption of energy and resources and the pollution caused by the production cycle of a given product. The product is followed throughout its entire life cycle, from the extraction of the raw materials, manufacturing and use, right through to recycling and final handling of waste.
terms.sldefinition: Izraz ekološko ravnovesje se nanaša na porabo energije in virov ter na onesnaženje, ki ga povzroča proizvodni ciklus določenega izdelka. Izdelek se spremlja skozi celoten življenjski ciklus, od zajema surovin, proizvodnje in rabe, do reciklaže in ravnanja z odpadki.

terms.definition: A colorless gas that, at room temperature, reacts with oxygen to form nitrogen dioxide; may be used to form other compounds.
terms.sldefinition: Brezbarvni plin, ki na sobni temperaturi reagira s kisikom in tvori dušikov dioksid; uporablja se tudi za tvorbo drugih spojin.

terms.definition: An enclosed heated compartment usually lined with a refractory material used for drying substances, firing ceramics, heat-treating, etc.
terms.sldefinition: Ograjen zaprt predel, ponavadi je obložen z lomljivo snovjo, uporablja se za sušenje, pečenje keramike, obdelovanje z vročino ipd.
NULL
NULL

terms.definition: The act or process of washing, laundering or removing dirt and other unwanted substances from the surface of an object, thing or place.
terms.sldefinition: Proces umivanja, pranja ali odstranjevanja nesnage in drugih neželenih snovi s površine nekega predmeta, stvari ali prostora.

terms.definition: 1) Part of a city at or near the centre, especially a slum area where poor people live in bad housing. 2) City centres of many industrialized countries which exhibit environmental degradation. The numerous and highly competitive activities entailing land use overwhelm the limited space and create a situation of overcrowding, functional incompatibility and cultural degradation. Inner city areas have a high level of commercial specialization, a large number of offices and a sizeable daytime population. At the same time, city centres generally remain a sort of ghetto for a permanent, low-income population living in run-down housing and enjoying little in the way of public services and civic amenities. The concentration of service industries inevitably entails the replacement of traditional housing and shops by office blocks, the provision of basic utilities at the expense of civic amenities and the provision of major access roads which eat up urban space. Structures of historic origin are often unable to meet modern requirements and, notwithstanding their value, frequently face demolition.
terms.sldefinition: 1) Mestni predel, ki se nahaja v središču ali v njegovi bližini. Območje barakarskih naselij, kjer živi revno prebivalstvo v slabih stanovanjskih razmerah. 2) Mestna središča mnogih industrializiranih držav izkazujejo degradirano okolje. Številčne in konkurenčne dejavnosti narekujejo rabo tal in so popolnoma preplavile zelo omejen prostor. Središče je zasičeno z njimi, pride do funkcionalne nepovezanosti in kulturne degradacije. Območja v mestnih središčih so komercialno visoko specializirana, tam se nahaja veliko pisarn in zadržuje veliko dnevnih migrantov. Obenem živijo v mestnih središčih, v t.i. getih, prebivalci z nizkimi prihodki. Živijo v razpadajočih stanovanjih, nimajo dostopa do vseh javnih storitev in do urbane infrastrukture. Zaradi porasta storitvenih dejavnosti izginjajo tradicionalne stanovanjske soseske in trgovine, ki jih nadomeščajo pisarniški objekti. To omogoča širitev osnovnih storitvenih dejavnosti na račun kakovosti življenja v mestih. Širi se tudi cestno omrežje, ki zaseda vedno več urbanega prostora. Zgodovinsko pomembne zgradbe pogosto ne dosegajo sodobnih gradbenih standardov tako, da jih veliko porušijo, čeprav izkazujejo določeno zgodovinsko vrednost.

terms.definition: A valve or gate fitted to a sluice to control the rate of flow of water.
terms.sldefinition: Zaklopka ali vrata na zapornici za nadzor ravni vodotoka.
NULL
NULL
NULL

terms.definition: Punishment for the commission of a specific crime, such as fines, restitution, probation and imprisonment.
terms.sldefinition: Kaznovanje, kot na primer globa, odškodnina, pogojen odpust kazni in zaporna kazen, zaradi storitve določenega prekrška ali kaznivega dejanja.
NULL

terms.definition: Housing or dwelling space provided for victims of a sudden, urgent and usually unexpected occurrence, especially when harm has been done to human life, property or the environment.
terms.sldefinition: Namestitev ali postavitev prostora, ki se priskrbi za žrtve ob nenadnih, urgentnih in ponavadi nepričakovanih dogodkih, zlasti, če je to povzročilo poškodbe ljudi, škodo na imetju ali v okolju.

terms.definition: The classification and separation of solid waste, according to type, at the location where it is generated.
terms.sldefinition: Razvrstitev in ločevanje trdnih odpadkov po obliki na zbiralni lokacij.

terms.definition: Measures by way of planning, prior approval of works, prohibition of some activities, physical structures, and restoration efforts to protect the coastline against the ravages of nature and haphazard and unplanned developments.
terms.sldefinition: Ukrepi za zaščito obale pred delovanjem naravnih sil, naključno škodo in nenačrtovanim razvojem, ki zajemajo odobritev določenih gradbenih del, prepoved določenih dejavnosti in gradnje objektov, odobravajo pa obnovitvena dela.

terms.definition: Any structure or edifice occupied by a body of top government administrators or other high ranking public officials selected or appointed by a head of state to manage certain aspects of a state's affairs.
terms.sldefinition: Vse zgradbe ali poslopja, zasedena z najvišjimi vladnimi uradniki ali drugimi visokimi uradniki, ki jih je državni voditelj izbral ali določil za vodenje določenih področij državnih zadev.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: A permanently waterlogged area in which there is often associated tree growth, e.g. mangroves in hot climates.
terms.sldefinition: Tesno povezavo z območji, ki so trajno napojena z vodo, ima rast dreves, kot na primer rast mangrove v vročem podnebju.

terms.definition: The entire course of action necessary to bring a law, resolution or special act to an authoritative, legally binding status.
terms.sldefinition: Celoten proces dejavnosti, ki je potreben za pripravo zakona, resolucije ali posebnega zakonodajnega akta, da ta dobi veljaven, pravno zavezujoč status.

terms.definition: Container whose return from the consumer or final user is assured by specific means (separate collection, deposits, etc.), independently on its final destination, in order to be reused, recovered or subjected to specific waste management operations.
terms.sldefinition: Embalaža, katere vrnitev s strani končnega porabnika je zagotovljena (ločeno zbiranje, odlagališča, itd.), da bi bila ponovno uporabljena, obnovljena ali bila predmet posebne obdelave odpadkov.

terms.definition: The process of breaking up and producing a diffuse distribution of the unusable aeriform fluid or suspension of fine particles in air resulting from a manufacturing process or the burning of a substance in an enclosed area.
terms.sldefinition: Postopek razpustitve in nastajanja razpršene razporeditve neuporabne, zračne tekočine ali lebdečih drobnih trdnih delcev v zraku, ki nastajajo ob proizvodnih procesih oziroma sežiganju snovi na zaprtih področjih.

terms.definition: Product that has undergone a partial processing and is used as raw material in a successive productive step.
terms.sldefinition: Izdelek, ki še ni izdelan do konca in se uporabi kot surovina v nadaljnjem proizvodnem postopku.

terms.definition: Agents that induce a permanent change in the genetic material.
terms.sldefinition: Sredstvo, ki povzroči trajne spremembe genskega materiala.

terms.definition: Substances capable of causing abnormal development of the embryo and congenital malformations.
terms.sldefinition: Snovi, ki lahko pri zarodku povzročijo patološki razvoj in prirojene deformacije.

terms.definition: System of heating all houses in a urban district from a central source (as from hot springs in Iceland or by cooling water from a power station).
terms.sldefinition: Sistem za ogrevanje vseh hiš urbanega predela iz osrednjega vira (kot na primer iz toplih vrelcev na Islandiji ali s hladilno vodo iz elektrarn).
NULL
NULL
NULL

terms.definition: An electric passenger railway operated in underground tunnels.
terms.sldefinition: Električna potniška železnica, ki deluje v podzemskih tunelih.
NULL

terms.definition: An organism that has undergone external processes by which its basic set of genes has been altered.
terms.sldefinition: Organizem, ki je bil izpostavljen delovanju zunanjih procesov, kar je povzročilo spremembe v njegovi osnovni genski zasnovi.

terms.definition: The activity of rowing, sailing or using a boat over a particular region of water, for amusement or enjoyment.
terms.sldefinition: Veslanje, jadranje ali uporaba čolna za zabavo na določeni vodni površini.

terms.definition: Any soluble substance composed of two or more unlike atoms held together by chemical bonds that reduces interfacial tension between liquids or a liquid and a solid, often used as detergents, wetting agents and emulsifiers.
terms.sldefinition: Vsaka topna snov iz dveh ali več različnih atomov, ki jih povezuje kemijska vez, ta zmanjšuje medploskovno napetost med tekočinama oziroma tekočino in trdno snovjo. Pogosto se uporablja kot detergent, vlažilno sredstvo in emulgator.
NULL

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Any substances or components left over from animal life, including body parts and, later, decomposed materials.
terms.sldefinition: Vse snovi in sestavine, ki ostanejo po odmrtju živali, vključno z deli telesa in, kasneje, razpadlih delov.

terms.definition: A map for navigation that delineates a portion of the sea, indicating the outline of the coasts and the position of rocks, sandbanks and other parts of a sea.
terms.sldefinition: Navtični zemljevid, ki prikazuje razdelitev morja, nakazuje obalno črto in položaj čeri, plitvin in drugih delov morja.
NULL
NULL
NULL

terms.definition: The act, process or industry of extracting coal, ores, etc. from the earth.
terms.sldefinition: Dejanje, postopek ali industrija izločanja premoga, rud, in drugega iz zemlje.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: The largest inland sea between Europe, Africa and Asia, linked to the Atlantic Ocean at its western end by the Strait of Gibraltar, including the Tyrrhenian, Adriatic, Aegean and Ionian seas, and major islands such as Sicily, Sardina, Corsica, Crete, Malta and Cyprus.
terms.sldefinition:
Največje celinsko (interkontinentalno) morje med Evropo, Afriko in Azijo, zahodni del morja ob Gibraltarskem prelivu je povezan z Atlantskim oceanom. Vključuje Tirensko, Jadransko, Egejsko in Jonsko morje ter večje otoke, kot so Sicilija, Sardinija, Korzika, Kreta, Malta in Ciper.
S Sueškim prekopom je povezan tudi z Rdečim morjem in Indijskim oceanom, z Bosporsko ožino v Marmarskem morju pa je povezan s Črnim morjem.

terms.definition: Local knowledge that is unique to a given culture or society, which is the basis for local-level decision making in agriculture, health care, education and other matters of concern in rural communities.
terms.sldefinition: Lokalno vedenje, ki je značilno za določeno kulturo ali družbo in je osnova za odločanje na lokalni ravni. Na primer v kmetijstvu, zdravstveni oskrbi, izobraževanju in na drugih področjih, ki zadevajo podeželske skupnosti.

terms.definition: A group of persons engaged in the same profession, business, trade or craft that is organized or formally structured to attain common ends.
terms.sldefinition: Skupina oseb v istem poklicu, poslu, trgovanju ali obrti, ki je organizirana ali formalno strukturirana za dosego skupnih ciljev.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: Organic pollutants that do not break down chemically and remain in the environment. Pollutants with higher persistence may produce more harmful environmental effects.
terms.sldefinition: Organsko onesnaževalo, ki se kemično ne razgradi in ostane v okolju. Visoko obstojna onesnaževala so lahko izredno škodljiva za okolje.

terms.definition: The transport or setting in motion by wind or water of insoluble particulate matter.
terms.sldefinition: Prenos ali gibanje netopnih delcev z vetrom ali vodo.

terms.definition: Destruction of wildlife habitats by increasing pressure for land by fast-growing human populations, pollution and over-exploitation. Whole species or populations of plants and animals have disappeared causing a loss of genetic resource that is not only regrettable from an aesthetic or philosophical point of view but also threatens man's food supply. Habitat loss takes several forms: outright loss of areas used by wild species; degradation, for example, from vegetation removal and erosion, which deprive native species of food, shelter, and breeding areas; and fragmentation, when native species are squeezed onto small patches of undisturbed land surrounded by areas cleared for agriculture and other purposes.
terms.sldefinition: Uničevanje življenjskih okolij prostoživečih živali poteka z naraščajočimi pritiski hitro rastočega števila prebivalstva, zaradi onesnaževanja in prevelike izrabe. Izginjajo celotne rastlinske in živalske vrste ter populacije, kar pomeni veliko izgubo genskih virov. To ni vredno obžalovanja zgolj iz estetskega ali filozofskega vidika, saj uničevanje habitatov ogroža tudi človekove zaloge hrane. Izguba habitatov se pojavlja v treh oblikah: popolna izguba območij, ki jih poseljujejo divje živalske in rastlinske vrste; degradacija, npr. zaradi odstranitve rastlinstva se poveča učinek erozije, kar avtohtone vrste prikrajša za hrano, kritje in za območja, kjer se razmnožujejo; fragmentacija, avtohtone vrste so se prisiljene umakniti na zaplate neokrnjene narave, ki jih obkrožajo ozemlja, ki so jih namenili za kmetijstvo in drugo rabo.
NULL

terms.definition: Any change in a body or substance that does not involve an alteration in its chemical composition.
terms.sldefinition: Vsaka sprememba snovi ali telesa, ki ne zajema spremembe kemične sestave.
NULL

terms.definition: The basic, underlying framework and features of a communications system supporting the exchange of knowledge, including hardware, software and transmission media.
terms.sldefinition: Osnovna zgradba in značilnosti komunikacijskega sistema, ki omogočajo izmenjavo znanja. Obsega strojno in programsko računalniško opremo ter oddajnike.

terms.definition: Data delimiting a given object, either physical or conceptual, in terms of its spatial relationship to the land, usually consisting of points, lines, areas or volumes defined in terms of some coordinate system.
terms.sldefinition: Podatki, ki razmejijo določen objekt, fizični ali abstraktni, v smislu prostorske lokacije v pokrajini, ponavadi sestavljeni iz točk, črt, območij ali prostora, ki je določen s koordinatnim sistemom.

terms.definition: An organization established primarily to acquire, analyze, process, store, retrieve, and disseminate one or more types of data.
terms.sldefinition: Organizacija, ki je bila primarno ustanovljena za pridobitev, analizo, obdelavo, shranjevanje, ponovno pridobitev ali razpršitev enega ali več vrst podatkov.

terms.definition: A business or organization that supplies connections to a part of the Internet, often through telephone lines.
terms.sldefinition: Podjetje ali organizacija, ki nudi povezave na del interneta, pogosto preko telefonskih linij.

terms.definition: A system of interrelated computer and telecommunications devices linked to permit the exchange of data in digital or analog signals.
terms.sldefinition: Sistem med seboj povezanih računalnikov in telekomunikacijskih naprav za omogočanje izmenjave podatkov v digitalni ali analogni obliki.

terms.definition: A system of interrelated computer and telecommunications devices linking two or more computers separated by a great distance for the exchange of electronic data.
terms.sldefinition: Sistem povezanih računalnikov in telekomunikacijskih naprav, ki na velike razdalje povezujejo dva ali več ločenih računalnikov za izmenjavo elektronskih podatkov.

terms.definition: A global consortium of local computer networks that uses the TCP/IP (Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol) protocol to connect machines to each other, providing access to the World Wide Web, Gopher, electronic mail, remote login and file transfer.
terms.sldefinition: Mednarodno združenj nacionalnih računalniških omrežij, ki uporabljajo protokol TCP/IP (Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol) za medsebojno povezavo več računalnikov, kar omogoča dostop svetovnega spleta, Gopherja, do elektronske pošte, daljinsko prijavo in prenos datotek.

terms.definition: A graphical, interactive, hypertext information system that is cross-platform and can be run locally or over the global Internet. The Web consists of Web servers offering pages of information to Web browsers who view and interact with the pages. Pages can contain formatted text, background colors, graphics, as well as audio and video clips. Simple links in a Web page can cause the browser to jump to a different part of the same page or to a page on a Web server halfway around the world. Web pages can be used to send mail, read news, and download files. A Web address is called a URL.
terms.sldefinition: Grafičen, interaktiven, hipertekstni informacijski sistem, delujoč na vseh tehnoloških osnovah, lahko teče lokalno (intranet) ali po globalnem internetu. Splet je sestavljen iz spletnih strežnikov, ki ponujajo strani z informacijami spletnim odjemalcem, ki jih lahko gledajo ali na njih aktivno sodelujejo. Strani vsebujejo besedilo, barvna ozadja, grafiko, avdio in video zapise. Preproste povezave na spletno stran popeljejo uporabnika na različne dele iste strani ali na stran na spletnem strežniku na drugi strani sveta. Spletne strani se uporabljajo za pošiljanje pošte, branje novic in snemanje datotek. Spletni naslov imenujemo URL.

terms.definition: The preset document that is displayed after starting a World Wide Web browser, or the main World Wide Web document in a series of related documents.
terms.sldefinition: Predhodno pripravljeno besedilo, ki se prikaže po zagonu brskalnika po svetovnem spletu ali osnovni spletni dokument iz niza sorodnih.

terms.definition: The organization of information units typically containing visible links that users can select or click with a mouse pointer or some other computer device to automatically retrieve or display other documents.
terms.sldefinition: Ureditev podatkovnih enot, običajno z vidnimi povezavami, ki jih uporabniki izberejo s pomočjo računalniške miške ali z drugo računalniško napravo za samodejno pridobitev ali prikaz drugih dokumentov.

terms.definition: An assemblage of computer hardware and software that can be linked by computer modem dialing for the purpose of sharing or exchanging messages or other files.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek računalniške opreme in programov, ki jih je moč povezati z računalniško modemsko zvezo, za razdelitev ali izmenjavo sporočil in drugih datotek.

terms.definition: A discussion group on a specific topic maintained on a computer network, frequently on the Internet.
terms.sldefinition: Diskusijska skupina na določeno temo, ki obstaja na računalniškem omrežju, pogosto na internetu.

terms.definition: Information or computer stored messages that are transmitted or exchanged from one computer terminal to another, through telecommunication.
terms.sldefinition: Informacija ali računalniško shranjena sporočila, ki so preko telekomunikacijskega omrežja poslana ali izmenjana z enega računalnika oz. terminala na drugega.

terms.definition: Any technical means used to combine text, sound, still or animated images and video in computers and electronic products, often allowing audience interactivity.
terms.sldefinition: Vsa tehnična sredstva, ki se uporabljajo za sestavljanje besedila, zvoka, mirujočih ali gibljivih slik in videov na računalnikih in elektronskih izdelkih, pogosto dovoljujejo vzajemno delovanje z občinstvom.

terms.definition: An exhibition, performance, demonstration or lecture utilizing communication media directed at both the sense of sight and the sense of hearing.
terms.sldefinition: Razstava, prireditev, prikaz ali lekcija, kjer uporabimo za komunikacijo zaznavanje z vidom in sluhom.

terms.definition: A set or collection of materials compiled to convey knowledge on some subject and usually placed in some type of container.
terms.sldefinition: Skupek ali zbirka gradiv, zbrana z namenom, da podajajo znanje o določeni tematiki. Lahko se hranijo v različnih oblikah.

terms.definition: A display of an object or collection of objects for general dissemination of information, aesthetic value or entertainment.
terms.sldefinition: Razstava nekega predmeta ali zbirke predmetov z namenom splošnega širjenja informacij, estetske vrednosti ali za zabavo.

terms.definition: A printed periodical bulletin circulated to members of a group.
terms.sldefinition: Tiskan, periodičen bilten, ki se razpošilja članom skupine.

terms.definition: A performance or production transmitted in sound signals with electromagnetic waves.
terms.sldefinition: Izvajanje ali produkcija zvočnih signalov, ki se prenaša z elektromagnetnimi valovi.

terms.definition: A performance or production transmitted in audiovisual signals with electromagnetic waves.
terms.sldefinition: Nastop oziroma produkcija, ki se prenaša v avdiovizualnih signalih z elektromagnetnim valovanjem.

terms.definition: The methods and activities employed by an individual, organization, corporation, or government to promote a favourable relationship with the public.
terms.sldefinition: Metode in dejavnosti posameznikov, organizacij, družb ali vlade, zaposlenih, da skrbijo za dobre odnose z javnostjo.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of people, devices or other resources organized for the exchange of data pertaining to the history, physical description, comparison, and classification of books and other works.
terms.sldefinition: Koordinirana skupina ljudi, naprav in drugih sredstev, vzpostavljeni za izmenjavo podatkov o zgodovini, fizičnem opisu, primerjavi in razvrščanju knjig in drugih del.

terms.definition: Data pertaining to the history, physical description, comparison, and classification of books and other works.
terms.sldefinition: Podatki o zgodovini, fizičnem opisu, primerjavi in razvrščanju knjig in drugih del.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of people, devices or other resources organized to provide directions leading people to sources known to provide knowledge or assistance on a specified topic or request.
terms.sldefinition: Usklajen zbor ljudi, naprav ali drugih virov, organiziranih za zagotavljanje navodil, ki ljudi vodijo k virom, za katere je znano, da zagotavljajo znanje ali pomoč o določeni temi ali zahtevi.

terms.definition: Directions leading someone to another source that is known to provide knowledge or assistance on the specified topic or request.
terms.sldefinition: Navodila, ki vodijo k drugemu viru, za katerega je znano, da zagotavlja znanje ali pomoč o določeni temi ali zahtevi.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of people, devices or other resources enabling the exchange of numerical data that has been collected, classified or interpreted for analysis.
terms.sldefinition: Koordinirana skupina ljudi, naprav in drugih sredstev, vzpostavljenih za izmenjavo številčni podatkov, ki so bili zbrani, razvrščeni ali razloženi za analizo.

terms.definition: Knowledge pertaining to the collection, classification, analysis and interpretation of numerical data.
terms.sldefinition: Znanje, ki se nanaša na zbiranje, razvrstitev, analiziranje in razlaganje številčnih podatkov.

terms.definition: The duties of an establishment, or a public institution, charged with the care and organizing of a collection of printed and other materials, and the duty of interpreting such materials to meet the informational, cultural, educational, recreational or research needs of its clients.
terms.sldefinition: Funkcije zavoda ali javne ustanove, da skrbijo za organiziranost zbirk tiskanih materialov in podobnega ter te materiale predstavljajo svojim odjemalcem v skrbi za njihove informacijske, kulturne, izobrazbene, rekreacijske ali raziskovalne potrebe.

terms.definition: The provision of aid by library staff trained to interpret library materials and library organizational structures to meet the informational, educational, cultural, recreational or research needs of the library's clients.
terms.sldefinition: Zagotavljanje pomoči uslužbencev v knjižnici, ki so usposobljeni za razlaganje knjižničnega gradiva in knjižničnih organizacijskih struktur za zadovoljevanje informacijskih, izobraževalnih, kulturnih, rekreacijskih ali raziskovalnih potreb svojih odjemalcev.

terms.definition: A service which creates a special contents list, containing titles, authors, abstracts, subject headings and other information, to describe a large number of publications and to be used in searchable, machine-readable (or printed) look-up tables.
terms.sldefinition: Storitev, ki ustvari poseben seznam z vsebino, vsebuje naslove, avtorje, izvlečke, naslove poglavij in druge informacije, ki opisujejo večje število publikacij. Uporablja se za pregledne, iskalne tabele, ki jih je moč pregledovati strojno (ali pa so že natisnjene).

terms.definition: The service provided by a library in which the library's clients are temporarily allowed to use books and other printed materials outside the library.
terms.sldefinition: Storitev, ki jo nudi knjižnica, ki svojim strankam začasno dovoli uporabo knjig in drugih tiskovin izven knjižnice.

terms.definition: The service provided by one library in which a second library's clients are temporarily allowed to use books and other printed materials belonging to the first library; and consequently the system providing rules and infrastructure for this service to a group of libraries.
terms.sldefinition: Storitev, ki jo nudi določena knjižnica, ki članom drugih knjižnic omogoča začasno izposojo njenih knjig in drugega knjižničnega gradiva. Posledično je vzpostavljen sistem, ki določa pravila in potrebno infrastrukturo za tako storitev, ki jo nudi skupina knjižnic.

terms.definition: A service provided by a library or other agency that periodically notifies users of new publications, report literature or other data sources in subjects in which the user has specified an interest.
terms.sldefinition: Usluga, ki jo zagotavlja knjižnica ali drug urad, ki uporabnike periodično obvešča o novih publikacijah ter sporoča literarne ali druge podatkovne vire o predmetu, ki je za uporabnike posebej zanimiv.

terms.definition: The provision of special aid by library staff trained to query bibliographic or other information contained on an electronic storage medium, usually to meet the research needs of the library's clients.
terms.sldefinition: Nudenje posebne pomoči knjižničnega osebja, usposobljenega za to, da poišče bibliografske ali druge podatke, ki so shranjeni na mediju za elektronsko shranjevanje, da zadostijo raziskovalnim potrebam uporabnikov knjižnice.

terms.definition: The provision of special aid by library staff trained to query bibliographic or other information contained on the Internet, a large distributed electronic system, usually to meet the research needs of the library's clients.
terms.sldefinition: Posebna pomoč, ki jo nudi knjižnično osebje, usposobljeno za iskanje bibliografskih ali drugih podatkov, ki se nahajajo na internetu. To je obsežen elektronski sistem, ki služi strankam knjižnice kot pomoč pri raziskovanju.

terms.definition: A central institution or agency for the collection, maintenance, and distribution of materials or data compiled to convey knowledge on some subject.
terms.sldefinition: Osrednja ustanova ali urad, ki zbira, hrani in deli gradivo ali podatke. Namen je podajati znanje o določeni tematiki.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of people, devices or other resources that analyzes, typically, business data and presents it so that users can make business decisions more easily.
terms.sldefinition: Usklajen zbor ljudi, naprav ali drugih virov, ki tipično analizira poslovne podatke in jih predstavi tako, da lahko uporabniki lažje sprejemajo poslovne odločitve.

terms.definition: No definition needed.
terms.sldefinition: NULL

terms.definition: A reciprocal transference of data between two or more parties for the purpose of enhancing knowledge of the participants.
terms.sldefinition: Vzajemna izmenjava podatkov med dvema ali več stranmi. Namen je zvišati kakovost znanja udeleženih v taki izmenjavi.

terms.definition: A collection of digital information items organized as a set of formally described tables from which the information can be accessed or reassembled in different ways without reorganizing the tables.
terms.sldefinition: Zbirka digitalnih informacijskih predmetov, ki so organizirani kot niz strogo opisanih tabel, iz katerih se dostopa do informacij ali pa se informacije ponovno zbere, ne da bi bilo pri tem tabele potrebno preoblikovati.

terms.definition: A remote sensing term referring to a scanning radiometer that simultaneously acquires images in various wavebands at the same time. A multispectral scanner can be carried aboard an aircraft or satellite. The Landsat multispectral scanner records images in four wavebands of visible and near infrared electromagnetic radiation to enable objects with different reflectance properties to be distinguished.
terms.sldefinition: Izraz za radiometer, namenjen sočasnemu skeniranju slik v različnih valovnih pasovih. Lahko je nameščen na letalu ali na satelitu. Landsatov multispektralni skener zapisuje slike v štirih valovnih pasovih vidnega in skoraj infrardečega elektromagnetnega sevanja, s tem omogoči razlikovanje objektov z različnimi odbojnimi lastnostmi.

terms.definition: A remote sensing term which has three separate applications: a) spatial resolution, which refers to the ability of a sensor to distinguish between objects that are spatially close to each other. It is a measure of the smallest angular or linear separation between two objects. b) Spectral resolution which refers to the ability of a sensor to distinguish between objects which are spectrally similar. It is a measure of both the discreteness of wavebands and the sensitivity of the sensor to distinguish between electromagnetic radiation intensity levels. c) Thermal resolution which refers to the ability of a sensor to distinguish between objects with a similar temperature.
terms.sldefinition: Izraz iz daljinskega zaznavanja, ki tri ločene uporabe: a) prostorska ločljivost se nanaša na zmožnost senzorja, da razlikuje med objekti, ki so prostorsko blizu drug drugemu. To je mera najmanjše kotne ali linearne ločenosti dveh objektov; b) spektralna ločljivost se nanaša na zmožnost senzorja, da razlikuje med objekti, ki so si spektralno podobni. To je merilo za ločenost valovnih dolžin in občutljivost senzorja, da razlikuje med stopnjami intenzivnosti elektromagnetnega sevanja; c) termalna ločljivost se nanaša na zmožnost senzorja, da razlikuje med objekti s podobno temperaturo.

terms.definition: A contraction of the words 'picture element'. The smallest unit of information in an image or raster map. Referred to as a resolution cell in an image or grid.
terms.sldefinition: Skrajšanje besed "slikovni element". Najmanjša informativna enota podobe ali zemljevida rastra. Nanaša se na resolucijsko celico podobe ali mreže.

terms.definition: Closely grouped bands of lines characteristic of molecular gases of chemical compounds (spectroscopy).
terms.sldefinition: Tesno skupaj razvrščene črte, ki so značilne za molekularne pline kemijskih spojin (spektroskopija)

terms.definition: A numeric string which uniquely identifies an image component of a geographical information system database.
terms.sldefinition: Številčni niz, ki edinstveno označuje slikovni element geografskega informacijskega podatkovnega sistema.

terms.definition: A coordinated assemblage of computer devices designed to capture and manipulate pictures stored as data in discrete, quantized units or digits.
terms.sldefinition: Usklajena nabor računalniških naprav, ki so namenjene zajemu in upravljanju s slikami, ki so shranjene kot podatki v diskretnih, kvantiziranih enotah ali številkah.

terms.definition: Techniques employed in the calibration of image data, the correction or reduction of errors occurring during capture or transmission of the data and in various types of image enhancement-operations which increase the ability of the analyst to recognize features of interest.
terms.sldefinition: Tehnike, ki se uporabljajo za umeritev slikovnih podatkov, za popravke ali odprava napak, ki se pojavijo pri zajemu ali prenosu teh podatkov, za različne postopke povečave slik, kar poveša sposobnost analitika, da prepozna določene pojave.

terms.definition: A remote sensing term referring to an automated process through which unidentified patterns can be classified into a limited number of discrete classes through comparison with other class-defining patterns or characteristics. Pattern recognition is an essential part of the classification of remotely sensed images and is used as an aid to image interpretation.
terms.sldefinition: Daljinsko zaznavanje je pojem, ki se nanaša na avtomatski postopek, skozi katerega se neidentificirani vzorci lahko razvrstijo v omejeno število diskretnih razredov s pomočjo primerjave z drugimi vzorci ali značilnostmi. Razpoznavanje vzorcev je bistveni sestavni del razvrščanja slik, zajetih na daljavo in se uporablja kot pomoč pri interpretaciji slik.

terms.definition: A composite photograph consisting of separate aerial photographs of overlapping surface areas, producing an overall image of a surface area too large to be depicted in a single aerial photograph.
terms.sldefinition: Sestavljena fotografija iz ločenih zračnih fotografij prekrivajočih se področij zemeljskega površja, ki ustvarja celotno podobo področja zemeljskega površja, prevelikega za upodobitev na posamezni zračni fotografiji.
